column1: Only 1 experimental SU-122P SPG was produced.";"簡介尚未準備好。";"简\t介\t尚\t未\t准\t备\t好\t。";;
encyclopedia/ussr_su_122/desc;"This SPG armed with a 122 mm М-30 Mod. 1938 howitzer was developed in October-November 1942 to support and escort tanks. In December of the same year
column2: it entered production and was put into service.

column1: The SPG was built on a T-34 chassis with an armoured cabin containing the driving compartment and the fighting compartment. To protect the howitzer's recoil mechanism
column2: a large forward-extending armoured mantlet was used which swung with the weapon. The gunnery equipment could be used to fire both directly and from cover. The howitzer's ammunition load of 40 shots included high-explosive fragmentation shells and hollow-charge projectiles. The vehicle's undercarriage differed from the T-34 in the strengthened head assembly of its suspension. A 9R radio set was mounted on the SPG
column3: along with the TPU-3-BisF intercom.

column1: The vehicle was produced throughout 1942-1943
column2: with 638 manufactured in total. Throughout its production
column3: a large number of modifications were implemented with the aim of improving the vehicle's quality and simplifying its manufacturing. Work performed on perfecting the manufacturing and assembly technologies involved reduced the labour costs of its production by 15%.

column1: The SU-122 was put into service in SPG regiments in quantities of up to 16 vehicles per regiment.

The SPG's flaws were: its small horizontal firing angle and complex aiming; long barrel length complicating manoeuvring on rough terrain and in urban areas; low rate of fire in combat; relatively small on-board ammunition capacity; and lack of a machine gun for self-defence. In spite of these flaws
column2: the SU-122's high firepower
column3: manoeuvrability and defensive capabilities made it a dangerous opponent in battle.";"Description à venir.";"Questo semovente armato con un obice da 122mm M-30 modello 1938
column4: venne sviluppato tra l'Ottobre ed il Novembre del 1942 per supportare e scortare i carri armati. Nel Dicembre dello stesso anno
column5: entrò in produzione e venne messo in servizio.

column1: Il SU-122 venne costruito su scafo T-34 ed una cabina corazzata dove vi era il compartimento di guida e quello di combattimento. Per proteggere il carro dal meccanismo di rinculo dell'obice
column2: venne utilizzato un grosso mantello del cannone corazzato. Il semovente poteva colpire il bersaglio sia per tiro diretto che da dietro una copertura idirettamente. Il munizionamento era di 40 colpi che includevano proiettili ad alto esplosivo a frammentazione e a carica cava. Differiva dal T-34 nel tipo di sospensioni che erano più robuste e la radio di tipo 9R con un sistema di comunicazione interfonica TPU-3-BisF.

column1: Il veicolo venne prodotto tra il 1942 ed il 1943 per un totale di 638 unità.
Durante la sua produzione vennero apportate moltissime modifiche tra cui il mirino ed altre minori che semplificarono la sua produzione con un risparmio del 15%.
Il SU-122 entrò in servizio con 16 unità per ogni reggimento di artiglierie.

I difetti erano: lo scarso angolo di fuoco orizzontale ed il sistema di puntamento complesso; la lunghezza della canna complicava le manovre su terreno sconnesso e nelle aree urbane; il basso rateo di fuoco in combattimento; la scarsa capacità di munizionamento e la mancanza di una mitragliatrice per la difesa dalla fanteria. Nonostante queste mancanze
column2: l'alta potenza di fuoco del mezzo
column3: la manovrabilità e la corazzatura ne fecero un avversario ostico in combattimento.";"Hinweis: Dieser Eintrag wird in Kürze auch auf Deutsch verfügbar sein.

column1: This SPG armed with a 122 mm М-30 Mod. 1938 howitzer was developed in October-November 1942 to support and escort tanks. In December of the same year
column2: it entered production and was put into service.

column1: The SPG was built on a T-34 chassis with an armoured cabin containing the driving compartment and the fighting compartment. To protect the howitzer's recoil mechanism
column2: a large forward-extending armoured mantlet was used which swung with the weapon. The gunnery equipment could be used to fire both directly and from cover. The howitzer's ammunition load of 40 shots included high-explosive fragmentation shells and hollow-charge projectiles. The vehicle's undercarriage differed from the T-34 in the strengthened head assembly of its suspension. A 9R radio set was mounted on the SPG
column3: along with the TPU-3-BisF intercom.

column1: The vehicle was produced throughout 1942-1943
column2: with 638 manufactured in total. Throughout its production
column3: a large number of modifications were implemented with the aim of improving the vehicle's quality and simplifying its manufacturing. Work performed on perfecting the manufacturing and assembly technologies involved reduced the labour costs of its production by 15%.

column1: The SU-122 was put into service in SPG regiments in quantities of up to 16 vehicles per regiment.

The SPG's flaws were: its small horizontal firing angle and complex aiming; long barrel length complicating manoeuvring on rough terrain and in urban areas; low rate of fire in combat; relatively small on-board ammunition capacity; and lack of a machine gun for self-defence. In spite of these flaws
column2: the SU-122's high firepower
column3: manoeuvrability and defensive capabilities made it a dangerous opponent in battle.";"La descripción estará lista pronto.";"Самоходная установка со 122-мм гаубицей М-30 образца 1938 года была разработана для поддержки и сопровождения танков в октябре-ноябре 1942 года
column4: а с декабря того же года принята на вооружение и запущена в серию.

column1: САУ представляла собой шасси танка Т-34 с установленной бронированной рубкой
column2: в которой размещались отделение управления и боевое отделение. Для защиты противооткатных устройств гаубицы использована выступающая вперёд и качающаяся вместе с орудием массивная бронированная маска. Приборы управления огнем позволяли вести стрельбу
column3: как прямой наводкой
column4: так и с закрытых позиций. Боекомплект гаубицы из 40 выстрелов включал осколочно-фугасные и кумулятивные снаряды. Ходовая часть установки отличалась от ходовой части танка Т-34 усиленными передними узлами подвески. На самоходной установке монтировались радиостанция 9Р
column5: а также танковое переговорное устройство ТПУ-3-БисФ.

column1: Установка выпускалась в течение 1942-1943 годов

column1: The SPG was built on a T-34 chassis with an armoured cabin containing the driving compartment and the fighting compartment. To protect the howitzer's recoil mechanism
column2: a large forward-extending armoured mantlet was used which swung with the weapon. The gunnery equipment could be used to fire both directly and from cover. The howitzer's ammunition load of 40 shots included high-explosive fragmentation shells and hollow-charge projectiles. The vehicle's undercarriage differed from the T-34 in the strengthened head assembly of its suspension. A 9R radio set was mounted on the SPG
column3: along with the TPU-3-BisF intercom.

column1: The vehicle was produced throughout 1942-1943
column2: with 638 manufactured in total. Throughout its production

column1: The SU-122 was put into service in SPG regiments in quantities of up to 16 vehicles per regiment.

The SPG's flaws were: its small horizontal firing angle and complex aiming; long barrel length complicating manoeuvring on rough terrain and in urban areas; low rate of fire in combat; relatively small on-board ammunition capacity; and lack of a machine gun for self-defence. In spite of these flaws
column2: the SU-122's high firepower
column3: manoeuvrability and defensive capabilities made it a dangerous opponent in battle.";"SU-122 \t自\t行\t火\t炮\t发\t展\t于\t 1942 \t年\t 10 \t月\t至\t 11 \t月\t间\t，\t这\t种\t自\t行\t火\t炮\t装\t备\t了\t一\t门\t 122 \t毫\t米\t M30 1938 \t型\t榴\t弹\t炮\t，\t用\t于\t支\t援\t和\t掩\t护\t坦\t克\t部\t队\t。\t同\t年\t 12 \t月\t该\t车\t进\t入\t量\t产\t并\t开\t始\t服\t役\t。\t

column1: \t这\t种\t自\t行\t火\t炮\t在\t T-34 \t中\t型\t坦\t克\t底\t盘\t的\t前\t部\t加\t装\t了\t一\t个\t大\t型\t装\t甲\t舱\t室\t，\t将\t战\t斗\t室\t和\t驾\t驶\t室\t整\t个\t包\t含\t在\t内\t。\t为\t了\t保\t护\t火\t炮\t的\t驻\t退\t机\t构\t，\t硕\t大\t的\t向\t前\t延\t伸\t的\t装\t甲\t炮\t盾\t将\t整\t个\t驻\t退\t机\t构\t完\t全\t包\t裹\t住\t，\t能\t够\t随\t着\t身\t管\t一\t起\t俯\t仰\t运\t动\t。\t这\t种\t火\t炮\t既\t能\t直\t瞄\t射\t击\t也\t能\t进\t行\t曲\t射\t。\t车\t内\t载\t有\t榴\t弹\t炮\t弹\t药\t共\t计\t 40 \t发\t，\t种\t类\t包\t括\t高\t爆\t榴\t弹\t和\t空\t心\t装\t药\t破\t甲\t弹\t。\t与\t T-34 \t相\t比\t，\t该\t车\t加\t强\t了\t底\t盘\t悬\t挂\t总\t成\t以\t适\t应\t车\t重\t的\t增\t加\t。\t通\t讯\t方\t面\t，\t车\t内\t装\t有\t一\t部\t 9R \t型\t车\t载\t无\t线\t电\t台\t，\t配\t合\t TPU-3-BisF \t型\t对\t讲\t机\t使\t用\t。\t

\t该\t车\t在\t 1942 \t年\t至\t 1943 \t年\t间\t持\t续\t生\t产\t，\t一\t共\t制\t造\t了\t 638 \t辆\t。\t于\t此\t同\t时\t，\t一\t系\t列\t旨\t在\t提\t升\t战\t车\t性\t能\t、\t简\t化\t生\t产\t工\t序\t的\t改\t进\t也\t从\t未\t间\t断\t过\t。\t这\t些\t努\t力\t卓\t有\t成\t效\t：\t随\t着\t生\t产\t和\t装\t配\t技\t术\t的\t逐\t渐\t完\t善\t，\t每\t辆\t车\t生\t产\t所\t需\t的\t劳\t动\t量\t降\t低\t了\t百\t分\t之\t十\t五\t。\t
SU-122 \t主\t要\t装\t备\t苏\t军\t的\t自\t行\t火\t炮\t团\t，\t每\t团\t装\t备\t有\t 16 \t辆\t。\t

\t当\t然\t这\t种\t武\t器\t也\t存\t着\t在\t诸\t多\t缺\t点\t，\t比\t如\t：\t火\t炮\t水\t平\t射\t界\t狭\t窄\t，\t瞄\t准\t过\t程\t麻\t烦\t；\t较\t长\t的\t炮\t管\t使\t其\t在\t城\t镇\t和\t复\t杂\t地\t形\t中\t机\t动\t不\t便\t；\t战\t斗\t射\t速\t较\t低\t；\t车\t内\t弹\t药\t存\t储\t数\t量\t较\t少\t；\t没\t有\t安\t装\t用\t于\t自\t卫\t的\t机\t枪\t等\t等\t。\t尽\t管\t存\t在\t着\t这\t样\t那\t样\t的\t不\t足\t，\t但\t凭\t借\t着\t猛\t烈\t的\t火\t力\t、\t良\t好\t的\t机\t动\t性\t和\t不\t错\t的\t防\t护\t性\t，\tSU-122 \t仍\t然\t是\t战\t场\t上\t可\t畏\t的\t对\t手\t。";"122 mm М-30 Mod. 1938 榴弾砲を\t搭載したこの\t自走砲は、\t戦車の\t支援と\t護衛を\t目的として、\t1942年\t10月から\t11月の\t間に\t開発されました。\t同年の\t12月に\t生産が\t開始され、\t軍に\t配備されました。\t

操縦室と\t戦闘室が\t含まれている\t装甲\tキャビンを\t搭載した\tT-34\tシャーシ\t上にこの\t自走砲は\t建造され、\t榴弾砲の\t反動機構を\t保護するために、\t武器と\t共に\t回転する\t大きな\t前方展開型の\t装甲防楯が\t備え\t付けられました。\t砲撃武器は、\t直接攻撃や\t防御攻撃の\t両方に\t使用することができ、\t榴弾砲に\t装填可能な\t砲弾数\t40発の\t中には、\t破片榴弾や\t成形爆薬投射物も\t含まれていました。\tこの\t車両の\t下部砲架は、\tサスペンションの\t強化された\tヘッド\t機構があるという\t点で、\tT-34\tとは\t異なっていました。\tこの\t自走砲には、\t9R\t無線装置と\tTPU-3-BisF\t通話装置が\t搭載されました。\t
この\t車両は\t1942年から\t1943年にかけて\t生産され、\t合計で\t638両製造されました。\t生産過程で、\t車両の\t性能を\t向上させること、\tまた、\t製造を\t簡易化することを\t目的として、\t多数の\t改良が\t施されました。\t完璧な\t生産と\t組立技術により、\t製造にかかる\t人件費を\t15%抑えることができました。\t
連隊ごとに\t最大\t16両の\t編成という\t形で、\tSU-122\tは\t自走砲連隊に\t配備されました。\t

この\t自走砲にあった\t欠点は、\t水平燃焼の\t角度が\t小さく\t照準を\t合わせるのが\t難しいこと、\t長い\t砲身により、\t非舗装路上と\t都市内での\t操縦が\t困難だったこと、\t戦闘中の\t発射率の\t低さ、\t搭載できる\t砲弾数が\t比較的少ないこと、\t自己防衛のための\t機関砲が\t搭載されていないことでした。\tこれらの\t欠点があったにも\t関わらず、\tSU-122\tの\t高い\t火力、\t操縦性、\t防御機能により、\t戦闘においては\t危険な\t相手となっていました。";"Descrição disponível em breve.";"This SPG armed with a 122 mm М-30 Mod. 1938 howitzer was developed in October-November 1942 to support and escort tanks. column1: encyclopedia/ussr_su_100_1945/desc;"In connection with the increased armour of new enemy heavy tanks
column2: it became necessary to create a self-propelled gun more powerful than the SU-85. Mass production of a new SPG under the designation SU-100 began at UZTM in August 1944. The engine
column3: transmission
column4: undercarriage and many other key parts from the T-34-85 tank were used in its design. It was armed with a 100 mm D-10S cannon with a 56 calibre barrel length. This weapon perfectly combined a high rate of fire with good ballistic characteristics. Its armour-piercing shell could penetrate 160 mm thick armour from a distance of 1000 metres. The vehicle had a standard design
column5: with the driving compartment in the front
column6: the fighting compartment in the middle and the engine compartment in the rear. Above the commander's place
column7: the cabin's roof contained a fixed command cupola with five observation slots for all-round visibility. The command cupola's hatch housed an MK-4 observation instrument and rotated on a bearing.

column1: The SPG was manufactured between 1944 and 1947
column2: and 2
column3: 495 SPGs of this type were produced during the Great Patriotic War.

column1: The SU-100 was first deployed in battle in January 1945. The SPGs showed their worth and earned a reputation as a reliable and powerful combat vehicle.
The vehicle also inherited negative aspects from its base tank
column2: such as its outdated suspension construction
column3: its fuel tank positioning in the fighting compartment
column4: and its unfavourable layout for an SPG. The SU-100's barrel length was even greater than that of the SU-85
column5: making manoeuvring difficult on rough terrain and in urban areas.

column1: After the war

\t在\t战\t后\t的\t岁\t月\t中\t，\tSU-100 \t坦\t克\t歼\t击\t车\t经\t历\t了\t多\t次\t现\t代\t化\t改\t进\t并\t在\t苏\t联\t军\t队\t中\t服\t役\t长\t达\t几\t十\t年\t。\t这\t些\t自\t行\t火\t炮\t也\t被\t苏\t联\t提\t供\t给\t她\t的\t盟\t国\t们\t，\t在\t一\t系\t列\t的\t局\t部\t战\t争\t和\t冲\t突\t中\t我\t们\t都\t能\t看\t到\t SU-100 \t的\t身\t影\t。";"敵の\t新型重戦車の\t装甲が\t強化されたのと\t関連して、\tSU-85\tよりも\t強力な\t自走砲を\t製造する\t必要が\t発生した。\tSU-100\tという\t名称で\t新しい\tSPGの\t大量生産が\t1944年\t8月に\tUZTMで\t開始した。\tT-34-85戦車から\tエンジン、\tトランスミッション、\t下部構造、\tそして\t他に\t多くの\t主要な\tパーツが\t設計に\t使用された。\t56口径砲身の\t100mm D-10S\t機関砲が\t搭載された。\tこの\t武器は、\t高い\t発射速度と\t優れた\t弾道性能を\t併せ\t持っていた。\tその\t徹甲弾は、\t1

column1: encyclopedia/ussr_kv_85/desc;"This tank was created based on the KV-1S due to delays in the IS-1's development. It was equipped with the turret developed for the IS-1 with an enlarged traverse circle
column2: strengthened armour and an 85 mm cannon. The new vehicle was the next step on the path to creating a heavy tank significantly different from a medium tank not only in its armour
column3: but in its firepower as well. The new cannon required a new ammo rack
column4: and the ammunition complement had to be reduced to 70 shells. The tank's main armament was an 85 mm D-5T-85 cannon with a rate of fire of up to 8 shots per minute. Standard ammunition for the 85 mm Mod. 1939 air defence gun was used in the cannon. Instead of a frontal machine gun
column5: a fixed bow machine gun was installed in a socket mount to the right of the driver
column6: which he used to lay down unaimed fire. This allowed the gunner/radio officer to be removed from the crew. Part of the ammunition complement and an additional fuel tank were installed in his place.

column1: Owing to the fact that the tank was an intermediate model
column2: it was manufactured for a relatively short time. In total
column3: 130 of them were made.

column1: KV-85 tanks served in guards assault tank regiments. The first regiment of these new tanks reached the front as early as the first days of September 1943 during battles to liberate Left-bank Ukraine. Alongside other vehicles
column2: the heavy tank was tasked with breaking through enemy positions and fighting armoured vehicles. When used correctly
column3: it could oppose the newest German heavy tanks
column4: which previously technically surpassed it. The tank had insufficient hull armour for the end of 1943
column5: providing adequate defence only against German guns below with a calibre below 75 mm.

column1: The KV-85 was an important intermediate link between pre-war heavy tank designs and the powerful IS tanks built to replace them.";"Description à venir.";"Questo carro è stato creato basandosi sul KV-1S a causa dei ritardi dello sviluppo dell'IS-1. Venne equipagiato con una torretta sviluppata per l'IS-1 con un anello di brandeggio ingrandito
column2: corazza rinforzata ed un cannone da 85mm. Il nuovo veicolo era il primo passo per creare un carro armato pesante molto differente da un carro medio non solo per la sua corazzatura ma anche per la sua potenza di fuoco. Il nuovo cannone richiedeva una nuova stiva munizioni che comprendeva 70 proiettili. L'armamento principale era il cannone da 85mm D5-T-85 con un rateo di fuoco di 8 colpi al minuto. Vennero utilizzate le munizioni standard del cannone antiaereo Mod. 1939. Al posto della mitragliatrice frontale ne venne installata una coassiale alla destra del pilota . Ciò permetteva all'artigliere/radiofonista di essere rimosso dall'equipaggio e vennero installate un serbatoio di carburante aggiuntivo al suo posto.

column1: Nonostante fosse un modello intermedio
column2: la sua costruzione venne effettuata in un periodo relativamente breve. Ne vennero costruiti 130 pezzi.

column1: I carri KV-85 prestarono servizio nei reggimenti d'assalto. Il primi a ricevere questo nuovo veicolo raggiunsero il fronte nei primi giorni del settembre 1943 durante le battaglie per liberare l'Ucraina. Altri furono accostati ai reggimenti di carri pesanti per sfondare attraverso le linee nemiche e combattere le unità corazzate. Quando venne  usato correttamente
column2: poteva opporsi ai più nuovi carri pesanti tedeschi che tecnicamente lo sovrastavano. Il carro armato aveva una corazzatura insufficente per la fine del 1943 ed era una difesa efficace solo contro i cannoni tedeschi al di sotto dei 75mm.

column1: The KV-85 was an important intermediate link between pre-war heavy tank designs and the powerful IS tanks built to replace them.";"该\t型\t战\t车\t源\t于\t IS-1 \t坦\t克\t开\t发\t迟\t滞\t，\t但\t事\t实\t证\t明\t，\t它\t也\t是\t尝\t试\t研\t发\t在\t装\t甲\t与\t火\t力\t上\t均\t凌\t驾\t于\t中\t型\t坦\t克\t的\t重\t坦\t的\t必\t经\t阶\t段\t。\t其\t底\t盘\t与\t KV-1S \t坦\t克\t相\t同\t，\t装\t甲\t更\t厚\t，\t而\t炮\t塔\t取\t自\t IS-1 \t坦\t克\t，\t因\t此\t炮\t塔\t滑\t轨\t环\t更\t大\t。\t其\t装\t有\t一\t门\t 85 \t毫\t米\t D-5T-85 \t主\t炮\t，\t极\t限\t射\t速\t为\t每\t分\t钟\t 8 \t发\t。\t该\t炮\t采\t用\t 85 \t毫\t米\t NMod.1939 \t防\t空\t炮\t的\t标\t配\t炮\t弹\t，\t但\t弹\t药\t架\t随\t炮\t重\t制\t，\t载\t弹\t量\t因\t此\t降\t至\t 70 \t发\t。\t其\t中\t一\t部\t分\t弹\t药\t和\t备\t用\t油\t箱\t内\t置\t于\t原\t机\t枪\t手\t（\t兼\t任\t通\t讯\t兵\t）\t处\t，\t而\t该\t岗\t位\t，\t连\t同\t其\t操\t作\t的\t机\t枪\t，\t均\t不\t复\t存\t在\t。\t取\t而\t代\t之\t的\t是\t一\t挺\t前\t射\t机\t枪\t，\t固\t定\t在\t驾\t驶\t员\t右\t侧\t的\t窝\t型\t区\t域\t中\t，\t仅\t限\t盲\t射\t。\t
\t鉴\t于\t该\t型\t战\t车\t的\t过\t渡\t型\t定\t位\t，\t其\t投\t产\t时\t间\t较\t短\t，\t总\t产\t量\t不\t过\t 130 \t辆\t。\t

\t该\t型\t战\t车\t为\t近\t卫\t装\t甲\t突\t击\t团\t专\t用\t车\t。\t其\t中\t某\t团\t于\t 1943 \t年\t的\t 9 \t月\t初\t一\t马\t当\t先\t，\t赶\t到\t并\t加\t入\t解\t放\t乌\t克\t兰\t左\t岸\t的\t战\t斗\t。\t与\t其\t他\t重\t型\t坦\t克\t同\t袍\t类\t似\t，\t该\t型\t战\t车\t也\t负\t责\t突\t破\t敌\t军\t防\t线\t与\t对\t抗\t敌\t军\t坦\t克\t。\t只\t要\t运\t用\t得\t当\t，\t该\t型\t战\t车\t甚\t至\t能\t挑\t战\t技\t术\t上\t先\t胜\t一\t筹\t的\t新\t锐\t德\t国\t重\t型\t坦\t克\t。\t但\t到\t 1943 \t年\t底\t，\t该\t型\t战\t车\t的\t车\t身\t装\t甲\t在\t面\t对\t德\t国\t 75 \t毫\t米\t口\t径\t以\t上\t的\t主\t炮\t时\t，\t就\t显\t得\t力\t不\t从\t心\t了\t。\t

\t众\t所\t周\t知\t，\t强\t大\t的\t IS \t系\t列\t坦\t克\t后\t来\t全\t面\t取\t代\t了\t终\t战\t前\t设\t计\t的\t老\t式\t重\t型\t坦\t克\t，\t而\t该\t型\t战\t车\t正\t是\t其\t中\t承\t上\t启\t下\t的\t关\t键\t一\t环\t。";"IS-1\tの\t開発が\t遅れたために、\tこの\t戦車は\tKV-1Sを\t基にして\t製造されました。\tこの\t車両には、\tIS-1\tのために\t開発された、\t拡大された\t旋回\tサークル、\t強化された\t装甲、\t85 mm\t砲が\t搭載された\t砲塔が\t備え\t付けられていました。\tこの\t新しい\t車両は、\t装甲だけではなく、\t火力の\t点においても、\t中戦車とは\t全く\t異なる\t重戦車を\t作るための\t次の\t段階になるべく\t開発されました。\t新しい\t砲には\t新たに\t弾薬庫を\t備え\t付ける\t必要があり、\t装填可能な\t砲弾数は\t70発にまで\t減らされました。\t1分間に\t最大\t8発砲弾可能な、\t85 mm D-5T-85砲がこの\t戦車の\t主要武装で、\t85 mm Mod.1939対空砲の\t標準的な\t砲弾は\t大砲で\t使用されました。\t操縦手がかつて\t敵を\t武装解除させる\t程の\t攻撃を\t行っていた、\t操縦主の\t右側の\tソケットマウントに、\t前方の\t機関砲の\t代わりに\t固定された\t機関砲が\t搭載されました。\tこの\t変更により、\t砲手と\t無線手は\t乗組員\tメンバーから\t外され、\t砲手と\t無線手が\t乗り\t込む\t位置に、\t予備の\t砲弾と\t追加の\t燃料\tタンクを\t搭載することができました。\t
この\t戦車は\t後に\t繋がる\t開発のために\t製造されたため、\t比較的短い\t期間で、\t合計\t130両しか\t製造されませんでした。\t

KV-85戦車は、\t近衛突撃戦車連隊に\t所属し、\tこの\t新しい\t戦車の\t最初の\t連隊は、\t1943年\t9月初めの\tウクライナ\t左岸を\t開放する\t戦闘中に\t早くも\t前線に\t配備されました。\tこの\t重戦車の\t任務は\t他の\t車両と\t共に\t敵陣を\t突破し、\t装甲車両と\t戦うことでした。\tこの\t戦車を\t正しく\t使用すると、\t以前は\t技術的に\t優れていた、\tドイツ\t製最新の\t重戦車を\t打ち\t破ることが\t出来ました。\t1943年の\t終わりには、\tこの\t車両の\t装甲は\t75 mm\t以下の\t口径の\tドイツの\t砲に\t対してのみしか\t十分な\t防御力を\t発揮することができず、\t十分なものではありませんでした。\t

encyclopedia/ussr_kv_2_1939/desc;"This tank came into service in the Red Army in 1940 and was an assault tank intended to be used to overcome long-term defensive positions. The KV-2 was armed with a powerful 152 mm M-10 cannon installed in its tall armoured rotating turret. This weapon was shot with separately loaded shells
column2: so its combat rate of fire was not high. The howitzer had relatively good characteristics. Its armour-piercing 52 kg round with a 436 m/s muzzle velocity penetrated a 72 mm thick armour plate at a distance of 1500 m at a 60° angle. For firing on concrete fortifications
column3: it possessed a 40 kg concrete-piercing shell with a 530 m/s muzzle velocity. All these vehicles were equipped with a 71-TK-3 radio set. The vehicle was armed with three additional 7.62 mm DT tank machine guns. One was paired with the howitzer
column4: the second mounted in the rear turret wall
column5: and the third mounted as a bow gun in the underturret box's frontal plate to the driver's left.

column2: 330 of these tanks had been produced in total
column3: and production ceased at the beginning of the Great Patriotic War.

column1: In mid-February 1940
column2: several of these heavy tanks were put to the test during the breaking of the Mannerheim Line. They broke through stone fortifications and destroyed pillboxes at close range
column3: allowing infantry divisions to pass through areas previously closed to them. Furthermore
column4: its strong armour could survive heavy fire from the enemy's anti-tank artillery. In the first years of the war
column5: the KV-2 was practically invulnerable to all forms of anti-tank artillery. A number of captured vehicles of this type were used by German troops.

column1: The tank had some serious flaws. Its mobility on the move and in combat was seriously limited by its high weight and issues with its clutch and transmission. When the vehicle was at a slight tilt
column2: the turret became extremely difficult to turn. Its ammunition complement for its main gun amounted to only 38 shells.";"Description à venir.";"Questo carro armato entrò in servizio nell'Armata Rossa nel 1940 come carro d'assalto per essere utilizzato come postazione difensiva a lungo termine. Il KV-2 venne armato con un potente cannone M-10 da 152mm installato nella sua grossa torretta corazzata. Questa arma sparava colpi da assemblare
column3: ed è per questo che il suo tasso di fuoco era basso. L'obice aveva delle buone caratteristiche. I suoi proiettili perforanti da 52kg con una velocità di volata di 436m/s potevano penetrare piastre spesse 72mm ad una distanza di 1500m a 60°. Per colpire le fortificazioni in cemento aveva anche dei proiettili penetranti da 40kg con una veolcità di volata di 530m/s. Questi veicoli erano equipaggiati con una radio 71-TK-3 ed armati con mitragliatrici aggiuntive DT da 7
column4: 62mm: una allineata con l'obice
column5: la seconda montata nella piastra postreiore della torretta ed una terza coassiale nella piastra frontale sotto la torretta accanto al pilota.

column1: Dal 1941
column2: vennero prodotte 330 unità in totale e la produzione cessò all'inizio della Grande Guerra Patriottica.

column1: A metà del febbraio del 1940
column2: questi carri pesanti vennero provati durante lo sfondamento della Linea Mannerheim. Distrussero le fortificazioni in pietra e le casamatte a corto raggio permettendo alle divisioni di fanteria di passare attraverso le aree precedentemente inaccessibili.

column1: La sua corazzatura poteva sopravvivere al fuoco delle artiglierie anti carri nemiche. Nei primi anni di guerra il KV-2 era praticamente invulnerabile a tutte le forme di armi anticarri. Alcuni esemplari vennero catturati ed utilizzati dalle truppe Tedesche.

Il carro aveva grossi punti deboli. La sua mobilità in combattimento era molto limitata a causa della massa che comprometteva il funzionamento di frizione e trasmissione. Quando il veicolo era posizionato in salita era estremamente difficile ruotarlo. La stiva munizioni contava solo 38 colpi.";"Hinweis: Dieser Eintrag wird in Kürze auch auf Deutsch verfügbar sein.

column5: поэтому боевая скорострельность была невысока. Гаубица имела сравнительно высокие показатели. Ее бронебойный снаряд массой 52 кг с начальной скоростью 436 м/с пробивал броневую плиту толщиной 72-мм на дистанции 1500 м
column6: под углом 60°. Для стрельбы по железобетонным укреплениям имелся бетонобойный снаряд массой 40 кг с начальной скоростью 530 м/с. На всех машинах устанавливалась радиостанция 71-ТК-З. Вооружение машины дополняли три 7
column7: 62-мм танковых пулемётами ДТ. Один спаренный с гаубицей
column8: второй в шаровой опоре в кормовой стенке башни
column9: и курсовой в лобовом листе подбашенной коробки слева от механика-водителя.

column1: Всего до лета 1941 года было выпущено около 330 экземпляров
column2: и с началом Великой Отечественной войны производство было остановлено.

column1: Несколько тяжёлых танков в середине февраля 1940 года проходили испытания при прорыве линии Маннергейма. Ими были проделаны проходы в гранитных надолбах и разрушены с близкого расстояния доты
column2: мешавшие продвижению стрелковых подразделений. Броня выдержала при этом сильный огонь противотанковой артиллерии противника. В первые годы войны КВ-2 оставался практически неуязвимым для всех видов противотанковой артиллерии. Некоторое количество трофейных машин использовалось немецкими войсками.

column1: Танк имел серьёзные недостатки. Его подвижность на марше и в бою была серьезно ограничена из-за большого веса и проблем со сцеплением и трансмиссией. Вращение башни при небольшом крене машины становилось крайне затруднительным. Боекомплект к орудию составлял всего 38 снарядов.";"Czołg ten wszedł do służby w Armii Czerwonej w 1940 roku. Celem niszczenia fortyfikacji betonowych czołg ten był wyposażony w specjalny pocisk przeciwbetonowy

column2: aby przetestować ich skuteczność w zwalczaniu fortyfikacji na Linii Mannerheima. Czołgom udało się niszczyć kamienne i betonowe bunkry z bliskiej odległości

column1: KV-2 \t异\t常\t高\t大\t的\t炮\t塔\t上\t装\t有\t一\t门\t 152 \t毫\t米\t ML-10 \t榴\t弹\t炮\t，\t这\t种\t武\t器\t发\t射\t的\t是\t分\t装\t式\t的\t弹\t药\t，\t因\t此\t实\t际\t战\t斗\t射\t速\t并\t不\t高\t。\t不\t过\t这\t门\t榴\t弹\t炮\t的\t性\t能\t还\t是\t比\t较\t不\t错\t的\t，\t配\t用\t的\t穿\t甲\t弹\t重\t 52 \t千\t克\t，\t炮\t口\t初\t速\t 436 \t米\t/\t秒\t，\t在\t 1500 \t米\t距\t离\t上\t可\t以\t击\t穿\t 60 \t度\t倾\t角\t的\t 72 \t毫\t米\t厚\t均\t质\t钢\t装\t甲\t。\t此\t外\t还\t有\t一\t种\t用\t于\t对\t付\t混\t凝\t土\t防\t御\t工\t事\t的\t半\t穿\t甲\t弹\t，\t这\t种\t混\t凝\t土\t破\t坏\t弹\t重\t 40 \t千\t克\t，\t炮\t口\t初\t速\t可\t达\t 530 \t米\t/\t秒\t。\t所\t有\t的\t KV-2 \t坦\t克\t都\t装\t有\t一\t部\t用\t于\t通\t讯\t的\t 71-TK-3 \t车\t载\t电\t台\t。\t除\t了\t主\t炮\t，\t该\t车\t还\t装\t备\t了\t 3 \t挺\t 7.62 \t毫\t米\t DT \t坦\t克\t机\t枪\t，\t第\t一\t挺\t与\t主\t炮\t并\t列\t，\t第\t二\t挺\t位\t于\t炮\t塔\t后\t部\t，\t第\t三\t挺\t安\t装\t在\t炮\t塔\t吊\t篮\t前\t面\t的\t车\t体\t前\t装\t甲\t开\t口\t上\t，\t位\t于\t驾\t驶\t员\t左\t侧\t。\t
\t随\t着\t伟\t大\t的\t卫\t国\t战\t争\t的\t爆\t发\t，\tKV-2 \t坦\t克\t的\t生\t产\t被\t迫\t中\t止\t。\t截\t止\t到\t 1941 \t年\t，\t已\t有\t 330 \t辆\t该\t型\t坦\t克\t被\t生\t产\t出\t来\t。\t

1940 \t年\t 1 \t月\t中\t旬\t，\t一\t些\t KV-2 \t坦\t克\t被\t投\t入\t到\t苏\t芬\t冬\t季\t战\t争\t的\t前\t线\t经\t受\t实\t战\t测\t试\t，\t参\t加\t了\t突\t破\t曼\t纳\t海\t姆\t防\t线\t的\t战\t斗\t。\t这\t些\t坦\t克\t突\t破\t了\t岩\t石\t建\t造\t的\t防\t御\t工\t事\t，\t在\t极\t近\t的\t距\t离\t上\t摧\t毁\t了\t大\t量\t地\t堡\t，\t使\t得\t跟\t进\t的\t步\t兵\t师\t得\t以\t通\t过\t这\t些\t先\t前\t突\t破\t的\t区\t域\t。\t更\t为\t重\t要\t的\t是\t，\t尽\t管\t经\t受\t了\t芬\t军\t反\t坦\t克\t炮\t兵\t的\t重\t火\t力\t打\t击\t，\t强\t大\t的\t装\t甲\t防\t护\t仍\t然\t保\t证\t了\t其\t战\t场\t生\t存\t力\t。\t而\t在\t卫\t国\t战\t争\t的\t头\t一\t个\t年\t头\t里\t，\t面\t对\t德\t军\t几\t乎\t所\t有\t种\t类\t的\t反\t坦\t克\t炮\t时\t，\tKV-2 \t都\t是\t无\t懈\t可\t击\t的\t。\t德\t军\t一\t些\t作\t战\t部\t队\t也\t曾\t使\t用\t过\t在\t战\t斗\t中\t缴\t获\t的\t KV-2 \t坦\t克\t。\t

\t当\t然\t这\t种\t体\t型\t硕\t大\t的\t坦\t克\t也\t有\t很\t多\t严\t重\t的\t缺\t陷\t：\t巨\t大\t的\t车\t重\t加\t上\t离\t合\t器\t和\t传\t动\t系\t统\t存\t在\t的\t问\t题\t都\t严\t重\t限\t制\t了\t KV-2 \t在\t行\t进\t和\t战\t斗\t中\t的\t机\t动\t能\t力\t；\t当\t车\t体\t略\t微\t倾\t斜\t时\t，\t炮\t塔\t的\t转\t动\t将\t变\t得\t非\t常\t吃\t力\t；\t主\t炮\t备\t弹\t总\t数\t也\t只\t有\t区\t区\t 38 \t枚\t。";"この\t戦車は\t1940年に\t赤軍に\t配備され、\t長期にわたっていた\t守備的な\t状況を\t打開するために\t使用する\t予定の\t駆逐戦車であった。\tKV-2\tは、\t背の\t高い\t装甲旋回式砲塔に\t強力な\t152mm M-10機関砲を\t装備した。\tこの\t機関砲は\t別々に\t装填された\t砲弾を\t発射したので、\tその\t戦闘発射速度は\t高くない。\t榴弾砲は\t比較的優れた\t性能をもっていた。\t52kgの\t徹甲弾は\t436m/sの\t砲口速度を\t持ち、\t1
column2: 500mの\t距離から\t60°の\t角度で、\t72mm\t厚の\t装甲板を\t貫通した。\tコンクリート\t製の\t防御設備を\t撃つのに、\t530m/sの\t砲口速度をもつ\t40kg\tコンクリート\t貫通弾を\t所有していた。\tすべてのこの\t戦車は\t71-TK-3無線\tセットを\t搭載した。\t戦車はさらに\t3丁の\t7.62mmDT\t戦車機関銃を\t装備した。\tうち\t1丁は\t榴弾砲と\t対となり、\t2丁目は\t砲塔後部の\t壁に\t設置され、\t3丁目は\t前方銃として、\t砲塔下部の\tボックスの\t正面\tプレートの\t操縦士の\t左側に\t設置された。\t

column1: 1941年までに\t合計で\t330台の\t戦車が\t生産され、\t生産は\t大祖国戦争の\t初めに\t止められた。\t

1940年\t2月の\t中旬に\tマンネルハイム\t線の\t突破を\t図る\t間、\tこの\t重戦車数台が\tテストにかけられた。\tこの\t戦車は\t石の\t防御設備を\t突破し、\t至近距離で\tトーチカを\t破壊し、\t歩兵師団が\t通ることができるように\t道を\t切り\t開いた。\tさらに、\tその\t強力な\t装甲は、\t敵の\t対戦車砲からの\t猛射を\t耐え\t抜くことができた。\t戦争の\t初めの\t年には、\tKV-2\tはすべての\t対戦車砲に\t対して\t事実上無力であった。\t多くの\t捕獲されたこの\tタイプの\t戦車は\tドイツ\t軍に\t使用された。\t

この\t戦車は、\tある\t重大な\t欠点をもっていた。\t移動と\t戦闘の\t際の\t機動性は、\tその\t重い\t重量と\tクラッチと\tトランスミッションの\t問題により、\t深刻な\tレベルで\t制限されていた。\t車両が\t少し\t傾くと、\t砲塔は\t旋回するのが\t非常に\t難しくなった。\t主砲の\t補充用砲弾はたった\t38発であった。";"Descrição disponível em breve.";"This tank came into service in the Red Army in 1940 and was an assault tank intended to be used to overcome long-term defensive positions. column1: Декілька важких танків в середині лютого 1940 року проходили випробування під час прориву лінії Маннергейма. Ними були пророблені проходи в гранітних надовбах і зруйновані зблизька доти
column2: які заважали просуванню стрілецьких підрозділів. Броня витримала при цьому сильний вогонь протитанкової артилерії противника. У перші роки війни КВ-2 залишався практично невразливим для всіх видів протитанкової артилерії. Деяка кількість трофейних машин використовувалася німецькими військами.

encyclopedia/ussr_kv_1e/desc;"After receiving the first reports from the front about the heavy tanks' deployment in battle
column2: the LKZ factory began to work on strengthening the KV's armour. The only weapon capable of penetrating the Soviet tank's frontal armour was the 88 mm 8.8 Flak 18 anti-aircraft cannon. Its anti-aircraft rounds
column3: even without an armour-piercing steel core
column4: had an 810 m/s muzzle velocity and could penetrate an 80 mm thick armour plate set at a 30 degree angle from a range of 1
column5: 000 metres. As a rule
column6: it disabled the KV-1 with 2-3 hits to its turret and hull. Specialists at the Leningrad Kirovsk factory developed a simple but effective up-armouring design previously used on the T-28 tank. The tank's turret and hull sides were fitted with 25 mm add-on armour plates
column7: increasing the overall armour width to 100 mm. Furthermore
column8: a small gap was left between the turret and the add-on armour. This improved the tank's defences when under fire from shaped high explosive shells. These modifications increased the tank's combat-loaded weight to 50 tonnes. Tanks modified in such a way could be discerned by the huge heads of the bolts used to attach the add-on armour plates.

column1: The main bulk of these up-armoured tanks was sent to the Northwestern and Leningrad fronts. Some of these tanks were captured intact and used by German forces.
The stationary nature of combat encounters did not allow the KV to truly come into its own. Apart from that
column2: tank units constantly complained about the vehicle's high weight
column3: which didn't just lead to technical problems. All it took was a few KV tanks driving along a road to make it difficult to negotiate for other vehicles
column4: even tracked ones. The heavy tank's mobility on loose ground or boggy terrain was unsatisfactory.";"Description à venir.";"Dopo aver ricevuto i primi rapporti dal fronte sull'utilizzo dei carri pesanti in battaglia
column5: le fabbriche LKZ iniziarono a lavorare sul rinforzamento delle corazze del KV. L'unica arma capace di penetrare la piastra frontale del carro Sovietico era il Flak 18 da 88mm antiaereo. I suoi proiettili
column6: nonostante non avessere un nucleo in acciaio perforante
column7: avevano una velocità alla volata di 810m/s che potevano penetrare una piastra inclinata a 30° da 80mm ad una distanza di 1000m. Di consueto poteva disabilitare il KV-1 con 2 o 3 colpi nella torretta e scafo. Gli specalisti alla fabbrica Kirovsk di Leningrado svilupparono un semplice ma efficace miglioramento già utilizzato sui carri T-28. I lati della torretta e dello scafo vennero dotati di piastre aggiuntive da 25mm aumentando lo spessore totale a 100mm. Venne lasciato uno spazio tra la torretta  e la piastra che aiutava a resistere agli impatti delle cariche ad alto esplosivo. Queste modifiche aumentarono il carico a 50 tonnellate. I carri modificati potevano essere distinti da quelli di serie poichè presentavano grossi bulloni che tenevano la piastra aggiuntiva.

column1: La maggior parte dei carri prodotti vennero mandati sui fronti Nord Occidentale e di Leningrado. Alcuni di questi carri vennero catturati dalle forze tedesche ed impiegati in battaglia.
Le battaglie stazionarie non permettevano al KV di entrare in azione propriamente. A parte ciò
column2: le unità che lo utilizzavano si lamentavano della grande massa del veicolo che costantemente creava problemi tecnici e la scarsa mobilità su terreni sconnessi era insoddisfacente.";"Hinweis: Dieser Eintrag wird in Kürze auch auf Deutsch verfügbar sein.

column10: it disabled the KV-1 with 2-3 hits to its turret and hull. Specialists at the Leningrad Kirovsk factory developed a simple but effective up-armouring design previously used on the T-28 tank. The tank's turret and hull sides were fitted with 25 mm add-on armour plates
column11: increasing the overall armour width to 100 mm. Furthermore
column12: a small gap was left between the turret and the add-on armour. This improved the tank's defences when under fire from shaped high explosive shells. These modifications increased the tank's combat-loaded weight to 50 tonnes. Tanks modified in such a way could be discerned by the huge heads of the bolts used to attach the add-on armour plates.

column1: The main bulk of these up-armoured tanks was sent to the Northwestern and Leningrad fronts. Some of these tanks were captured intact and used by German forces.
The stationary nature of combat encounters did not allow the KV to truly come into its own. Apart from that
column2: tank units constantly complained about the vehicle's high weight
column3: which didn't just lead to technical problems. All it took was a few KV tanks driving along a road to make it difficult to negotiate for other vehicles
column4: even tracked ones. The heavy tank's mobility on loose ground or boggy terrain was unsatisfactory.";"簡介尚未準備好。";"简\t介\t尚\t未\t准\t备\t好\t。";;

column1: encyclopedia/ussr_kv_1_zis_5;"KV-1 ZiS-5";"KV-1 ZiS-5";"KV-1 (ZiS-5)";"KV-1 ZiS-5";"KV-1 ZiS-5";"КВ-1 ЗиС-5";"KW-1 ZiS-5";"KV-1 (ZIS-5)";"KV-1 ZiS-5";"KV-1/ZiS-5";"KV-1 ZiS-5";"KV-1 ZiS-5";"KV-1 ZiS-5";"КВ-1 ЗіС-5";"KV-1 ZiS-5";"KV-1 ZiS-5";"KV-1 ZiS-5 장착형";"КВ-1 ЗІС-5";"KV-1 ZiS-5";"KV-1/ZiS-5";"KV-1/ZiS-5";;
encyclopedia/ussr_kv_1_zis_5/desc;"In 1941
column2: the KV-1's design underwent a number of changes. In the autumn of 1941
column3: 3-5 additional fuel tanks were installed on the tank's track fenders without a link to the fuel system. The drop-forged tracks were replaced with cast tracks. In December 1941
column4: the tanks were equipped with the 10-R radio set. Some of the vehicles produced by the ChKZ factory were made with cast turrets with a rounded front weapon slot. Its armour thickness was upgraded to 82 mm.

column1: The tank's armament was improved by installing a ZiS-5 cannon with a 41.5 calibre barrel length. This weapon was created based on the F-34
column2: with differently designed cradle and gun mantlet parts. Its armour-piercing round had a 680 m/s muzzle velocity. Its overall ammunition complement was increased to 114 rounds. The hull's frontal projection was strengthened with add-on 25 mm armour plates.

column1: However
column2: the changes listed above did not lead to significant improvements in the KV-1's design. The tank's primary flaws remained uncorrected. It often broke down as a result of its transmission failing and was too slow.

KV tanks served in the main battalions of mixed tank brigades and heavy tank assault regiments. They were actively deployed in the Great Patriotic War until mid-1944. Captured tanks of this type were used by Wehrmacht units.";"Description à venir.";"Nel 1941
column3: il progetto del KV-1 subì diversi cambiamenti. Nell'autunno del 1941
column4: vennero installate 3-5 serbatoi di carburanti sui parafanghi del carro armato senza il collegamento al sistema di alimentazione. I cingoli a stampo vennero rimpiazzati con quelli a maglia. Nel dicembre del 1941
column5: venne equipaggiata una radio 10-R ed alcuni veicoli prodotti dalla fabbrica ChKZ vennero dotati di torretta fusa con angoli arrotondati nella parte frontale ed uno spessore aumentato a 82mm.

column1: L'armamento principale venne migliorato installando un cannone da 41
column2: 5 calibri ZiS-5
column3: creato basandosi sul F-34 con un profilo differente ed un nuovo mantello. I suoi proiettili perforanti avevano una velocità alla volata di 680m/s. In totale potevano essere caricati 114 proiettili e lo scafo anteriore venne rinforzato con piastre da 25mm aggiuntive.

column1: Tuttavia
column2: i cambiamenti citati non migliorarono significativamente il KV-1. I problemi principali del carro non furono risolti. Spesso si rompeva la trasmissione ed era troppo lento.

column1: I KV prestarono servizio nei principali battaglioni di carri misti e nei reggimenti di carri pesanti d'assalto tra il 1941 ed il 1943. Vennero dispiegati attivamente nella Grande Guerra Patriottica fino a metà del 1944. Alcune unità catturate vennero utilizzate dai reparti della Wehrmacht.";"Hinweis: Dieser Eintrag wird in Kürze auch auf Deutsch verfügbar sein.

column3: для увеличения дальности хода

column5: без подключения их к системе питания. Штампованные траки гусеницы были заменены на литые. С декабря 1941 года танки оснащались радиостанцией 10-Р. Часть машин производства ЧКЗ выпускалась с литыми башнями
column6: которые имели закругленную форму кормовой ниши. Толщина бронирования была доведена до 82 мм.

column1: Вооружение танка было усилено установкой пушки ЗИС-5 с длиной ствола 41
column2: 5 калибра. Это орудие было создано на основе Ф-34
column3: отличаясь от неё конструкцией элементов люльки и бронемаски. Начальная скорость бронебойного снаряда повысилась до 680 м/с. Общий запас снарядов увеличился до 114 штук. Лобовая проекция корпуса была усилена дополнительными 25-мм броневыми листами.

column1: Однако перечисленные мероприятия не привели к существенному улучшению конструкции КВ-1. Основные недостатки тяжёлого танка остались прежними. Он часто выходил из строя в результате поломки трансмиссии
column2: был слишком медлительным.

column1: В 1941-1943 годах КВ состояли на вооружении первых батальонов танковых бригад смешанной организации и тяжёлых танковых полков прорыва. Принимали активное участие в боевых действиях Великой Отечественной войны до середины 1944 года. Трофейные машины использовались частями Вермахта.";"W 1941 roku
column2: projekt czołgu KW-1 przeszedł wiele zmian. Jesienią 1941
column3: na błotnikach zainstalowano od 3 do 5 zbiorników paliwa oraz wprowadzono nowy typ gąsienic. W grudniu 1941
column4: czołgi zostały wyposażone w radiostację 10-R. Niektóre z czołgów wyprodukowanych przez fabrykę ChKZ posiadały wieżę z zaokrąglonym przednim pancerzem. Jego grubość wynosiła 82 mm.

column1: Uzbrojenie czołgu zostało wzmocnione poprzez zainstalowanie działa ZiS-5 o długości 41

column3: posiadało zmodyfikowaną kołyskę oraz osłonę. Pociski przeciwpancerne osiągały prędkość 680 m/s
column4: a ilość amunicji zwiększono do 114 sztuk. Grubość przedniego pancerza kadłuba została zwiększona

Captured tanks of this type were used by Wehrmacht units.";"1941 \t年\t，\t该\t型\t战\t车\t接\t受\t了\t多\t次\t改\t进\t。\t是\t年\t秋\t，\t其\t履\t带\t挡\t泥\t板\t上\t加\t装\t外\t置\t油\t箱\t，\t每\t辆\t 3 \t至\t 5 \t个\t不\t等\t，\t安\t全\t起\t见\t，\t均\t不\t与\t原\t供\t油\t系\t统\t连\t接\t \t。\t履\t带\t制\t造\t工\t艺\t也\t由\t落\t锻\t改\t为\t浇\t铸\t。\t12 \t月\t，\t统\t一\t配\t装\t了\t 10-R \t电\t台\t组\t。\t由\t基\t洛\t夫\t工\t厂\t生\t产\t的\t部\t分\t实\t车\t采\t用\t浇\t铸\t炮\t塔\t，\t设\t有\t朝\t前\t的\t圆\t形\t武\t器\t槽\t。\t其\t炮\t塔\t装\t甲\t厚\t度\t增\t至\t 82 \t毫\t米\t，\t车\t身\t正\t面\t也\t加\t装\t了\t 25 \t毫\t米\t装\t甲\t板\t。\t

column1: \t该\t型\t战\t车\t的\t主\t炮\t也\t换\t装\t为\t更\t强\t的\t ZiS-5 \t坦\t克\t炮\t，\t41.5 \t倍\t径\t，\t备\t弹\t增\t至\t 114 \t发\t。\t其\t原\t型\t为\t F-34 \t坦\t克\t炮\t，\t主\t要\t区\t别\t在\t于\t托\t架\t和\t炮\t盾\t。\t该\t炮\t发\t射\t穿\t甲\t弹\t时\t，\t炮\t口\t初\t速\t可\t达\t 680 \t米\t/\t秒\t。\t
\t然\t而\t，\t上\t述\t改\t进\t治\t标\t不\t治\t本\t，\t该\t型\t战\t车\t的\t硬\t伤\t犹\t在\t。\t其\t车\t速\t奇\t慢\t，\t且\t传\t动\t机\t构\t经\t常\t故\t障\t，\t导\t致\t抛\t锚\t。\t

1941 \t至\t 1943 \t年\t，\t该\t型\t战\t车\t主\t要\t服\t役\t于\t混\t编\t装\t甲\t旅\t的\t主\t力\t营\t，\t或\t重\t型\t坦\t克\t突\t击\t团\t。\t直\t到\t 1944 \t年\t中\t期\t，\t苏\t军\t仍\t将\t该\t型\t战\t车\t大\t量\t部\t署\t在\t卫\t国\t战\t争\t中\t的\t各\t大\t战\t场\t，\t连\t德\t国\t国\t防\t军\t都\t曾\t缴\t获\t并\t使\t用\t过\t该\t型\t战\t车\t。";"1941年には、\tKV-1\tの\t設計に\t数多くの\t変更が\t加えられました。\t1941年の\t秋、\t燃料系統に\t繋げずに、\t3～5基の\t燃料\tタンクを\t戦車の\t無限軌道の\t防舷物上に\t搭載し、\t鉄の\t型押しの\t無限軌道を、\t鋳造製の\t無限軌道に\t入れ\t替えました。\t1941年\t12月、\tこの\t戦車には\t10-R\t無線\tセットが\t備え\t付けられました。\tChKZ\t工場で\t製造された\t車両の\t中には、\t曲線形の\t前方武器\tスロットが\t備わっている\t鋳造製砲塔が\t搭載されたものもありました。\tこの\t砲塔の\t装甲の\t厚さは\t82 mmに\t増加しました。\t

41.5口径の\t砲身がある\tZiS-5砲の\t搭載により、\t戦車の\t武装は\t改良されました。\t揺架と\t防楯の\t部分が\t異なる\t設計をした、\tF-34\tを\t基にこの\t武器が\t作られたのです。\tこの\t砲から\t発砲される\t徹甲弾の\t初速は\t秒速\t680 mでした。\t全体的な\t砲弾補完数は\t114発まで\t拡大され、\t車体の\t突起部は、\t25 mmの\t装甲\tプレート\t追加することによって\t強化されました。\t
しかし、\t上記の\t変更は\tKV-1\tの\t設計に\t大幅な\t改善をもたらすことはなく、\tこの\t戦車の\t主な\t欠点は\t修正されずじまいでした。\t変速装置の\t欠陥がしばしば\t故障に\t繋がり、\tこの\t戦車の\t速度はあまりにも\t遅すぎたのです。\t
1941年から\t1943年の\t間、\tKV\t戦車は\t戦車団と\t重戦車攻撃連隊が\t組み\t合わさった\t主大隊に\t配備され、\t1944年の\t半ばまで、\t大祖国戦争で\t活発に\t使用されました。\t鹵獲されたこの\t戦車は、\tドイツ\t国防軍の\t部隊で\t使用されました。";"Descrição disponível em breve.";"In 1941

column1: encyclopedia/ussr_kv_1_L_11/desc;"The first clashes with Spanish nationalists armed with light anti-tank weapons made it clear that a new heavy tank with cannonproof armour had to be created. The heavy tank's design began at the end of 1938.
For 1940
column2: the mass-produced KV-1 was a truly pioneering innovation
column3: embodying the most advanced ideas of its time: individual torsion-bar suspension
column4: reliable cannonproof armour and a single powerful universal weapon within a classic layout. This was the first time such an arrangement was used on a Soviet mass-produced heavy tank
column5: which meant that the KV-1 received the strongest defences and most potential for modernisation. The tank's armoured hull was welded from 75
column7: 30 and 20 mm thick rolled armour plates. The KV-1 was equipped with a 500 hp B-2K diesel engine and a 76.2 mm L-11 cannon with an ammunition complement of 111 shots
column8: in addition to three 7.62 mm DT machine guns. One was paired with the cannon
column9: while the others were placed on the bow and stern in ball mounts. When necessary
column10: the machine guns could be removed and used outside the tank.

column1: Для 1940 года серийный КВ-1 являлся подлинно новаторской конструкцией

column1: 1940 \t年\t时\t，\t该\t量\t产\t型\t战\t车\t堪\t称\t前\t无\t古\t人\t的\t大\t突\t破\t。\t其\t具\t备\t独\t立\t扭\t杆\t悬\t挂\t、\t可\t靠\t的\t防\t弹\t装\t甲\t，\t以\t及\t在\t经\t典\t布\t局\t下\t强\t力\t而\t通\t用\t的\t单\t门\t武\t器\t。\t可\t以\t说\t，\t当\t时\t最\t先\t进\t的\t理\t念\t在\t该\t型\t战\t车\t上\t悉\t数\t实\t现\t。\t当\t时\t苏\t联\t量\t产\t重\t型\t坦\t克\t尝\t试\t如\t此\t配\t置\t尚\t属\t首\t例\t，\t该\t型\t战\t车\t的\t防\t护\t和\t现\t代\t化\t改\t造\t潜\t力\t因\t此\t登\t峰\t造\t极\t。\t其\t车\t身\t由\t 75 \t毫\t米\t、\t40 \t毫\t米\t、\t30 \t毫\t米\t和\t 20 \t毫\t米\t的\t轧\t制\t装\t甲\t焊\t接\t而\t成\t，\t内\t置\t 500 \t马\t力\t的\t B-2K \t柴\t油\t引\t擎\t，\t装\t有\t一\t门\t备\t弹\t 111 \t发\t的\t 76.2 \t毫\t米\t L-11 \t炮\t。\t该\t型\t战\t车\t还\t有\t 7.62 \t毫\t米\t DT \t同\t轴\t机\t枪\t一\t挺\t，\t置\t于\t球\t形\t机\t枪\t托\t中\t的\t同\t型\t前\t射\t和\t后\t射\t机\t枪\t各\t一\t挺\t。\t必\t要\t时\t，\t上\t述\t三\t挺\t机\t枪\t均\t可\t拆\t卸\t出\t来\t另\t作\t他\t用\t。\t
\t该\t型\t战\t车\t在\t冬\t季\t战\t争\t前\t线\t首\t次\t亮\t相
column2: 并\t成\t功\t地\t通\t过\t了\t实\t战\t试\t炼\t。\t敌\t人\t的\t反\t坦\t克\t武\t器\t无\t法\t伤\t其\t分\t毫\t。\t当\t时\t，\t该\t型\t战\t车\t遭\t遇\t数\t辆\t甚\t至\t数\t十\t辆\t德\t国\t坦\t克\t后\t全\t身\t而\t退\t的\t战\t例\t数\t不\t胜\t数\t。\t

column1: \t该\t型\t战\t车\t的\t硬\t伤\t同\t样\t惊\t人\t：\t它\t的\t传\t动\t机\t构\t和\t空\t气\t过\t滤\t系\t统\t糟\t糕\t透\t顶\t，\t履\t带\t和\t负\t重\t轮\t耐\t用\t性\t低\t，\t车\t组\t动\t作\t受\t限\t，\t对\t外\t视\t野\t不\t足\t。\t其\t引\t擎\t和\t传\t动\t机\t构\t常\t在\t酣\t战\t中\t瘫\t痪\t。\t该\t型\t战\t车\t炮\t塔\t重\t达\t 7 \t吨\t，\t其\t瞄\t准\t机\t构\t内\t杠\t杆\t和\t电\t动\t马\t达\t因\t此\t超\t负\t荷\t，\t导\t致\t炮\t塔\t旋\t转\t方\t面\t效\t率\t颇\t低\t，\t故\t障\t频\t发\t。";"軽い\t対戦車武器を\t備えた\tスペインの\t国家主義者との\t初めての\t戦闘で、\t大砲に\t耐性がある\t新しい\t重戦車を\t製造しなければならないことが\t判明しました。\tこの\t重戦車の\t設計は\t1938年の\t終わりに\t始まりました。\t

1940年の\t間に\t大量生産された\tKV-1\tは、\t正に\t技術の\t先駆者であり、\t個別の\t捩じり\t式\tバネの\tサスペンション、\t砲に\t耐性のある\t信頼性が\t高い\t装甲、\t典型的な\t位置に\t備えられた\t強力な\t汎用武器といった、\t当時の\t最新の\tアイディアが\t具体化されたものでした。\tソ\t連で\t量産された\t重戦車にこのような\t仕様が\t施されたのはこれが\t初めてであったため、\tKV-1\tには\t最強の\t防衛手段が\t備えられ、\t現代化改修される\t可能性が\t最も\t高い\t戦車となりました。\t戦車の\t車体の\t装甲には、\t75、\t40、\t30、\t20mmの\t厚さの\t圧延装甲\tプレートが\t溶接されており、\tKV-1\tには\t500馬力出力可能な\tB-2K\tディーゼルエンジンと、\t111弾装填可能な\t76.2 mm L-11砲、\t3挺の\t7.62 mm DT\t機関銃が\t備えられていました。\tDT\t機関銃の\t内\t1挺は\t砲と\t共に\t搭載され、\t残りの\t2挺は\t球状托架内にある\t首の\t部分と\t後部に\t搭載されていました。\t必要に\t応じて、\t機関銃を\t取り\t外し、\t戦車の\t外側に\t搭載することも\t可能でした。\t

KV-1戦車は\t冬戦争の\t前線で、\t戦闘での\tデビューを\t果たしました。\t敵からの\t攻撃による\t試練をうまく\t突破し、\tどの\t敵の\t対戦車砲弾も\tKV-1\tを\t破壊することは\t出来ませんでした。\tこの\t新しい\t戦車が\t生還した\t時は、\t多くの\t場合、\t数両だけではなく、\t数十両もの\tドイツの\t戦車と\t共に\t生き\t延びることができました。\t

不完全に\t設計された\t変速装置や\tエアフィルター、\t耐久性に\t欠けた\t無限軌道や\t主車輪、\t狭い\t戦闘室や\t視界が\t優れていないことなど、\tKV-1戦車にはいくつかの\t深刻な\t欠点がありました。\t集約的に\t使用すると\tエンジンや\t変速装置はよく\t壊れてしまい、\t戦車に\t搭載されている\t7\tトンもの\t砲塔も、\t様々な\t問題を\t引き\t起こしました。\tまた、\tこの\t砲塔の\t重さは、\t照準装置の\tレバーにかかる\t大きい\t力や\t電気\tモーターにかかる\t低電力が\t関係した\t砲塔の\t回転の\t問題にも\t繋がっていました。";"Descrição disponível em breve.";"The first clashes with Spanish nationalists armed with light anti-tank weapons made it clear that a new heavy tank with cannonproof armour had to be created. The heavy tank's design began at the end of 1938.

column1: For 1940
column2: the mass-produced KV-1 was a truly pioneering innovation
column3: embodying the most advanced ideas of its time: individual torsion-bar suspension
column4: reliable cannonproof armour and a single powerful universal weapon within a classic layout. This was the first time such an arrangement was used on a Soviet mass-produced heavy tank
column5: which meant that the KV-1 received the strongest defences and most potential for modernisation. The tank's armoured hull was welded from 75
column7: 30 and 20 mm thick rolled armour plates. The KV-1 was equipped with a 500 hp B-2K diesel engine and a 76.2 mm L-11 cannon with an ammunition complement of 111 shots
column8: in addition to three 7.62 mm DT machine guns. One was paired with the cannon
column9: while the others were placed on the bow and stern in ball mounts. When necessary
column10: the machine guns could be removed and used outside the tank.

column1: The KV-1 tanks made their debut on the Winter War front. The tank successfully passed its trial by fire. No enemy anti-tank cannon was able to destroy it. Many times
column2: the new vehicles survived battle not only with several
column3: but with several dozen German tanks.

column1: The tank had some serious drawbacks: its poorly designed transmission and air filter
column2: insufficiently durable tracks and road wheels
column3: a crowded fighting compartment and poor vision. The engine and transmission often broke down during intensive use. The tank's 7 tonne turret also caused many problems. column1: encyclopedia/ussr_isu_152/desc;"In the autumn of 1943
column2: the KV-1S heavy tank was removed from mass production along with the successful SU-152 SPG based on the KV tanks. However

column1: The SPG's layout was standard. A cabin made from rolled armour plates was installed in the front of the vehicle
column2: combining the driving compartment and fighting compartment into one section. The engine compartment was placed in the rear of the vehicle. Because of the smaller width of the IS in comparison to the KV
column3: the side plates' vertical slope was decreased from 25° to 15°
column4: and its rear plate's slope removed altogether. At the same time
column5: the cabin's frontal armour thickness was increased to 90 mm and its side armour to 75 mm. The gun mantlet was 60 mm thick
column6: subsequently increasing to 100 mm. The vehicle was armed with a 152.4 mm ML-20 Mod. 1937/43 gun-howitzer with a 28 calibre barrel length and an ammunition capacity of 21 shells. After the war
column7: the SPG's ammunition capacity was increased to 30 shots during modernisation. Starting from October 1944
column8: an anti-tank turret equipped with a 12.7 mm DShK machine gun was attached on a traversing base on the commander's hatch.

column1: The ISU-152's main role in battle was providing fire support to advancing tanks and infantry. These heavy SPGs were sometimes used in artillery preparation strikes. They could fire both directly and from cover. The SPGs were indispensable in urban battles. ISU-152s were used to suppress the Hungarian Uprising of 1956.
ISU-152 SPGs served in the Polish Army. After the war
column2: Czechoslovakia received these vehicles. At the beginning of the 1960s
column3: an Egyptian army regiment had an ISU-152 in service.

column1: La conformazione dell'SPG era standard. Una casamatta costituita di piastre installata nella parte frontale del veicolo combinando il compartimento di guida con quello di combattimento in una unica sezione. Il compartimento del motore era posizionato nel retro del veicolo. A causa della larghezza ridotta dell'IS nei confronti del KV
column2: le piastre laterali ebbero una incidenza minore da 25° a 15° e quella posteriore rimossa. Allo stesso tempo la parte frontale venne rinforzata portando a 90mm la corazzatura e quelle laterali a 75mm. Il mantello del cannone era spesso 60mm e successivamente aumentato a 100mm. Il veicolo era armato con un obice da 152
column3: 4mm ML-20 Mod. 1937/43 da 28 calibri ed una capacità di munizionamento di 21 colpi e dopo la guerra aumentata a 30 colpi durante gli ammodernamenti. A partire dall'ottobre del 1944 venne equipaggiato con una mitragliatrice da 12
column4: 7mm DShK sulla postazione del comandante.

column1: Dal novembre del 1943 fino alla fine della produzione di massa nel 1946

column1: Il ruolo principale dell'ISU-152 era di fornire fuoco di supporto ai carri in avanzata ed alla fanteria. Questi semoventi pesanti erano utilizzati anche come fuoco d'artiglieria. Potevano sparare direttamente e da copertura. Erano indispensabili nelle battaglie urbane ed utilizzati per fermare la rivolta Ungherese del 1956.
Prestarono servizio nell'Esercito Polacco e dopo la guerra in Cecoslovacchia. Agli inizi del 1960 un reggimento dell'Esercito Egiziano aveva ancora un ISU-152 in servizio.

Tra i punti deboli del veicolo vi erano la poca ventilazione nel vano di combattimento. Il peso dei proiettili richiedevano buone doti fisiche per il servente e a causa di ciò il rateo di fuoco era insoddisfacente. La piccola capacità di munizionamento ed i serbatoi all'interno dello scafo erano anch'essi un serio punto debole.";"Hinweis: Dieser Eintrag wird in Kürze auch auf Deutsch verfügbar sein.

column1: С ноября 1943 года и до окончания серийного производства в 1946 году было выпущено 3242 экземпляров.
Главной боевой функцией ИСУ-152 была огневая поддержка наступающих танков и пехоты. Тяжелые САУ иногда привлекались к участию в артподготовках. При этом огонь велся как прямой наводкой
column2: так и с закрытых позиций. Установки были незаменимы в уличных боях. ИСУ-152 использовались при подавлении Венгерского восстания 1956 года.

column1: САУ ИСУ-152 состояли на вооружении Войска Польского. После войны установки получила Чехословакия. В начале 1960-х один полк армии Египта также имел на вооружении ИСУ-152.
Среди недостатков машины была отмечена плохая вентиляция боевого отделения. Большая масса снарядов требовала от заряжающего хорошей физической выносливости

column1: ISU-152 \t自\t行\t火\t炮\t的\t布\t局\t看\t起\t来\t中\t规\t中\t矩\t。\t由\t轧\t制\t钢\t装\t甲\t板\t焊\t接\t成\t的\t舱\t室\t被\t安\t装\t在\t车\t体\t前\t部\t，\t将\t战\t斗\t室\t和\t驾\t驶\t室\t整\t合\t在\t一\t起\t，\t而\t动\t力\t舱\t位\t于\t车\t体\t后\t部\t。\t由\t于\t IS \t坦\t克\t的\t底\t盘\t相\t较\t KV \t坦\t克\t的\t要\t窄\t小\t一\t些\t，\t为\t了\t适\t应\t新\t底\t盘\t的\t尺\t寸\t，\tISU-152 \t战\t斗\t室\t的\t侧\t装\t甲\t板\t倾\t角\t由\t SU-152 \t的\t 25 \t度\t修\t改\t到\t了\t 15 \t度\t，\t战\t斗\t室\t后\t部\t的\t倾\t角\t则\t完\t全\t取\t消\t了\t。\t与\t此\t同\t时\t，\t战\t斗\t室\t正\t面\t装\t甲\t的\t厚\t度\t增\t加\t到\t 90 \t毫\t米\t，\t侧\t面\t厚\t度\t也\t增\t加\t到\t了\t 75 \t毫\t米\t。\t炮\t盾\t厚\t 60 \t毫\t米\t，\t随\t后\t又\t被\t加\t强\t到\t 100 \t毫\t米\t。\t该\t车\t装\t备\t一\t门\t 28 \t倍\t径\t的\t 152.4 \t毫\t米\t ML-20 1937/43 \t型\t榴\t弹\t炮\t，\t车\t内\t载\t弹\t 21 \t枚\t。\t经\t过\t战\t后\t的\t现\t代\t化\t改\t进\t之\t后\t，\t载\t弹\t量\t提\t高\t到\t 30 \t枚\t。\t从\t 1944 \t年\t 10 \t月\t起\t，\t一\t挺\t 12.7 \t毫\t米\t的\t德\t什\t卡\t机\t枪\t被\t安\t装\t在\t车\t长\t舱\t口\t处\t的\t可\t转\t动\t枪\t架\t上\t。\t

column2: 242 \t辆\t ISU-152 \t自\t行\t火\t炮\t被\t制\t造\t出\t来\t。\tISU-152 \t在\t战\t场\t上\t的\t首\t要\t角\t色\t是\t作\t为\t自\t行\t火\t炮\t为\t推\t进\t中\t的\t己\t方\t坦\t克\t和\t步\t兵\t提\t供\t火\t力\t支\t援\t。\t这\t种\t重\t型\t自\t行\t火\t炮\t有\t时\t也\t作\t为\t攻\t击\t开\t始\t前\t的\t准\t备\t火\t力\t炮\t兵\t使\t用\t。\t他\t们\t可\t以\t直\t射\t开\t火\t亦\t可\t以\t进\t行\t覆\t盖\t式\t曲\t射\t。\t这\t些\t自\t行\t火\t炮\t在\t进\t行\t城\t市\t巷\t战\t时\t具\t有\t不\t可\t或\t缺\t的\t重\t要\t作\t用\t。\tISU-152 \t参\t与\t了\t 1956 \t年\t镇\t压\t匈\t牙\t利\t起\t义\t的\t行\t动\t。\t

column1: ISU-152 \t自\t行\t火\t炮\t也\t曾\t在\t波\t兰\t军\t队\t中\t服\t役\t。\t捷\t克\t斯\t洛\t伐\t克\t也\t在\t战\t后\t接\t收\t了\t一\t些\t。\t60 \t年\t代\t初\t期\t，\t埃\t及\t陆\t军\t也\t曾\t获\t得\t过\t一\t个\t团\t的\t ISU-152\t。\t

\t在\t这\t种\t战\t车\t的\t诸\t多\t缺\t点\t中\t，\t糟\t糕\t的\t战\t斗\t室\t通\t风\t系\t统\t是\t尤\t为\t明\t显\t的\t一\t个\t。\t沉\t重\t的\t炮\t弹\t对\t装\t填\t手\t的\t体\t能\t和\t耐\t受\t力\t提\t出\t了\t极\t高\t的\t要\t求\t，\t即\t便\t如\t此\t，\tISU-152 \t的\t战\t斗\t射\t速\t还\t是\t低\t的\t让\t人\t难\t以\t忍\t受\t。\t还\t有\t它\t较\t低\t的\t车\t载\t弹\t药\t容\t量\t以\t及\t内\t置\t的\t燃\t料\t箱\t也\t被\t看\t做\t是\t非\t常\t严\t重\t的\t设\t计\t缺\t陷\t。";"1943年の\t秋、\tKV\t戦車を\t基盤にした\tSU-152 SPGの\t成功にともなって、\tKV-1S\t重戦車は\t大量生産から\t取り\t外された。\tしかし、\tKVと\tISの\tシャーシが\t似ているという\t事実は\t新しい\tSPGは\t新しい\t重戦車を\t基盤にして\t製造できるということを\t意味していた。\t

SPGの\t設計は\t標準的なものだった。\t丸めた\t装甲板で\t作られた\tキャビンが\t車両の\t前部に\t設けられ、\t操縦区画と\t戦闘用区画を\t1\tつにまとめた。\tエンジン\t室が\t車体後部に\t設けられたが、\tKVに\t比べて\tISは\t幅が\t狭いため、\t側面\tプレートの\t縦方向の\t傾斜は 25°から\t15°に\t減らされ、\tそして\t後部\tプレートの\t傾斜はすべて\t取り\t除かれた。\t同時に\tキャビンの\t正面装甲の\t厚さは\t90mmにまで\t上げられ、\t側面の\t装甲も\t75mmにまで\t上げられた。\t大砲の\t防盾は\t60mm\t厚だったが、\tその\t後\t100mmまで\t上げられた。\tこの\t戦車は\t28口径砲身の\t152.4mm ML-20 Mod. 1937/43加農榴弾砲を\t搭載し、\t砲弾許容量は\t21発であった。\tそして\t戦後、\t近代化の\t際に\tSPGの\t砲弾許容量は\t30発まで\t上げられた。\t1944年\t10月に\t始まった\t12.7mm DShK\t機関銃を\t装備した\t対戦車砲塔は、\t戦車長\tハッチの\t旋回盤に\t設置された。\t
1943年\t11月から\t1946年に\t大量生産が\t終わるまでに、\t3
column2: 242台が\t製造された。\t

column1: ISU-152\tの\t戦闘における\t主な\t役割は、\t前進する\t戦車や\t歩兵への\t援護射撃であった。\tこれらの\t重\tSPGは、\t攻撃準備射撃にも\t使用されることもあった。\tこの\t戦車は\t直接照準と\t遮蔽物からの\t両方の\t射撃が\t可能であったため、\tSPGは、\t市街戦には\t必須の\t兵器であった。\t
また、\tISU-152\tは\t1956年の\tハンガリー\t動乱を\t鎮圧するのにも\t使用された。\t
ISU-152 SPGは、\tポーランド\t陸軍で\t運用された。\t戦後、\tチェコスロバキアがこれらの\t車両を\t引き\t継いだ。\tその\t後\t1960年代の\t初めには、\tエジプト\t陸軍の\t連隊も\tISU-152\tを\t運用した。\t

この\t戦車の\t欠点としては\t主に、\t戦闘用区画の\t不十分な\t換気が\t特に\t挙げられる。\t砲弾の\t重さは\t装填士に\t優れた\t持久力を\t要求するものであるにも\t関わらず、\tSPGの\t発射速度は\t不十分なものであった。\tまた、\t搭載できる\t砲弾許容量が\t少ないことと、\t内部に\t設置された\t燃料\tタンクも、\t重要な\t欠点と\t見られていた。";"Descrição disponível em breve.";"In the autumn of 1943
column2: the KV-1S heavy tank was removed from mass production along with the successful SU-152 SPG based on the KV tanks. However
column3: the fact that the KV and IS chassis were similar meant that a new SPG could be built based on the new heavy tank.

column1: The SPG's layout was standard. A cabin made from rolled armour plates was installed in the front of the vehicle
column2: combining the driving compartment and fighting compartment into one section. The engine compartment was placed in the rear of the vehicle. Because of the smaller width of the IS in comparison to the KV
column3: the side plates' vertical slope was decreased from 25° to 15°
column4: and its rear plate's slope removed altogether. At the same time
column5: the cabin's frontal armour thickness was increased to 90 mm and its side armour to 75 mm. The gun mantlet was 60 mm thick
column6: subsequently increasing to 100 mm. The vehicle was armed with a 152.4 mm ML-20 Mod. 1937/43 gun-howitzer with a 28 calibre barrel length and an ammunition capacity of 21 shells. After the war
column7: the SPG's ammunition capacity was increased to 30 shots during modernisation. Starting from October 1944
column8: an anti-tank turret equipped with a 12.7 mm DShK machine gun was attached on a traversing base on the commander's hatch.

column1: From November 1943 until the end of mass production in 1946
column3: 242 of them were manufactured.

column1: The ISU-152's main role in battle was providing fire support to advancing tanks and infantry. These heavy SPGs were sometimes used in artillery preparation strikes. They could fire both directly and from cover. The SPGs were indispensable in urban battles. ISU-152s were used to suppress the Hungarian Uprising of 1956.
ISU-152 SPGs served in the Polish Army. After the war
column2: Czechoslovakia received these vehicles. At the beginning of the 1960s
column3: an Egyptian army regiment had an ISU-152 in service.

column3: and even then

З жовтня 1944 року на обертовому погоні основи командирського люка почала встановлюватися зенітна турель з 12

column1: З листопада 1943 року й до закінчення серійного виробництва в 1946 році було випущено 3242 екземплярів.
Головною бойовою функцією ІСУ-152 була вогнева підтримка наступаючих танків і піхоти. Важкі САУ іноді залучалися до участі в артпідготовці. При цьому вогонь вівся як прямою наводкою
column2: так і з закритих позицій. Установки були незамінні у вуличних боях. ІСУ-152 використовувалися під час придушення Угорського повстання 1956 року.

column1: САУ ІСУ-152 перебували на озброєнні Війська Польського. Після війни установки отримала Чехословаччина. На початку 60-х років один полк армії Єгипту також мав на озброєнні ІСУ-152.
Серед недоліків машини була відзначена погана вентиляція бойового відділення. Велика маса снарядів вимагала від заряджаючого хорошій фізичній витривалості
column2: і навіть у цьому випадку скорострільність САУ була незадовільною. Малий боєкомплект самохідки та розміщення паливних баків усередині машини також були визнані значними недоліками.";"Opis će uskoro biti završen.";"1943. őszén megszüntették a KV-1S nehéz tankok gyártását és ezzel a rajtuk alapulú SU-152 páncélvadászokét is. column13: SPG의 탄약 적재량은 30발로 현대화(modernisation)되었다. 1944년 10월부터 12.7mm DShK 기총을 장착한 대전차 포탑이 전차장 해치를 베이스로 한 traversing base에 장착되었다. 1943년 11월부터 1946년까지 3242량의 차량이 양산되었다. 전투 중 ISU-152의 주 역할은 advancing tanks와 보병들에게 화력지원을 제공하는 것이었다. 이런 HEAVY SPG들은 자주포 사전포격에 사용되기도 했다 (These heavy SPGs were sometimes used in artillery preparation strikes ?) 직사와 곡사 둘 다 가능했다. SPG들은 시가전에서 필수였다. ISU-152 전차들은 1956년 헝가리 반란(업라이징)을 진압(Suppress) 하는데 쓰였다. isu-152 전차들은 폴란드 군대에서도 사용되었다. 전후에 체코슬로바키아가 이 전차들을 받았다. 1960년대 초

column1: The ISU-152's main role in battle was providing fire support to advancing tanks and infantry. These heavy SPGs were sometimes used in artillery preparation strikes. They could fire both directly and from cover. The SPGs were indispensable in urban battles. ISU-152s were used to suppress the Hungarian Uprising of 1956.
ISU-152 SPGs served in the Polish Army. After the war
column2: Czechoslovakia received these vehicles. At the beginning of the 1960s
column3: an Egyptian army regiment had an ISU-152 in service.

column1: Among the vehicle's drawbacks
column2: poor fighting compartment ventilation was noted. The shells' high weight demanded good physical endurance from the loader
column3: and even then
column4: the SPG's rate of fire was unsatisfactory. Its small on-board ammunition capacity and internally placed fuel tanks were also seen as serious flaws.";"簡介尚未準備好。";"简\t介\t尚\t未\t准\t备\t好\t。";;

column1: encyclopedia/ussr_isu_122s;"ISU-122S";"ISU-122S";"ISU-122S";"ISU-122S";"ISU-122S";"ИСУ-122С";"ISU-122S";"ISU-122S";"ISU-122S";"ISU-122S";"ISU-122S";"ISU-122S";"ISU-122S";"ІСУ-122С";"ISU-122S";"ISU-122S";"ISU-122S";"ІСУ-122С";"ISU-122S";"ISU-122S";"ISU-122S";;

encyclopedia/ussr_isu_122s/desc;"The ISU-122S self-propelled gun was created in April 1944 as a modernised variation of the ISU-122 SPG. It differed from the latter in that it was equipped with a 122 mm D-25S Mod. 1944 cannon with a wedge-type semi-automatic breech block and a muzzle brake. The barrel's length came to 48 calibres. The height of its firing line came to 1
column2: 795 mm. The vehicle had a five-man crew and its crew housing was the same as in the ISU-122. The use of this cannon increased its rate of fire in combat from 2.2 to 3 shots per minute. The cannon's new compact recoil mechanisms and breech housing provided better working conditions for the combat crew. Artillery superiority over the enemy had been absent for some time
column3: but the use of the D-25S cannon brought it back. It had higher combat characteristics than the German 75 mm and 88 mm weapons
column4: and penetrated enemy tank armour at a range of up to 2
column5: 500 m. In urban battles however
column6: the 122 mm cannon's barrel length often prevented the vehicle from manoeuvring in tight spots.

column1: From August 1944 to September 1945
column2: the ISU-122 with its A-19 cannon and the modernised ISU-122S with its D-25S cannon were produced in tandem
column3: as the 122 mm D-25S cannon supply was insufficient to furnish all the SPGs. By the 1st of June 1945
column4: 475 ISU-122S SPGs were built and used in battles in the final stage of the Great Patriotic War. In total
column5: 675 of them were made in their mass production period.

column1: ISU-122S SPGs were used across the entire functional scope of self-propelled artillery application. It was used as an assault weapon in breaking through fortified zones and in urban battles
column2: but with reduced effectiveness in comparison to the ISU-152. On the whole
column3: the SPG was highly regarded in this role as well.

column1: In the middle of the 1960s
column2: the SPGs were removed from service in the Soviet Army.";"Description à venir.";"Il semovente ISU-122S venne creato nell'aprile del 1944 come ammodernamento del ISU-122. Era differente nell'equipaggiamento del cannone da 122mm D-25S Mod. 1944 con una culatta semi automatica ed un soppressore di fiamma sul cannone da 48 calibri. Il veicolo aveva un equipaggio di cinque uomini così come nell'ISU-122. L'utilizzo di questo cannone incrementò il rateo di fuoco in combattimento da 2.2 a 3 colpi al minuto. Il nuovo meccanismo di rinculo compatto e la culatta miglioravano le condizioni di lavoro per l'equipaggio di combattimento. La superiorità di artiglieria sopra il nemico è stata assente per qualche periodo ma con l'uso del D-25S venne ripristinata. Aveva migliori caratteristiche di combattimento delle armi da 75mm e 88mm tedesche
column3: poteva penetrare anche le corazzature dei carri nemici fin da 2
column4: 500m. Tuttavia in aree urbane la lunghezza della canna creava disagi nelle manovre in spazi angusti.

column1: Dall'agosto del 1944 al settembre del 1945 l'ISU-122 con il suo cannone A-19 ed il modernizzato ISU-122S con il D-25S vennero prodotti in tandem poichè i cannoni da 122mm erano insufficenti per essere equipaggiati in tutti i semoventi. Dal 1 giugno 1945 vennero costruiti 475 ISU-122S ed usati in battaglia nella fase finale della Grande Guerra Patriottica per un totale di 675 unità durante tutto il periodo di produzione.

I semoventi vennero usati interamente con lo scopo di artiglierie semoventi per assaltare zone fortificate e battaglie urbane ma con efficacia ridotta in confronto al ISU-152. Complessivamente questo carro si è comportato molto bene nel suo ruolo e a metà degli anni '60 venne ritirato dal servizio nell'Esercito Sovietico.";"Hinweis: Dieser Eintrag wird in Kürze auch auf Deutsch verfügbar sein.

The ISU-122S self-propelled gun was created in April 1944 as a modernised variation of the ISU-122 SPG. It differed from the latter in that it was equipped with a 122 mm D-25S Mod. 1944 cannon with a wedge-type semi-automatic breech block and a muzzle brake. The barrel's length came to 48 calibres. The height of its firing line came to 1
column2: 795 mm. The vehicle had a five-man crew and its crew housing was the same as in the ISU-122. The use of this cannon increased its rate of fire in combat from 2.2 to 3 shots per minute. The cannon's new compact recoil mechanisms and breech housing provided better working conditions for the combat crew. Artillery superiority over the enemy had been absent for some time
column3: but the use of the D-25S cannon brought it back. It had higher combat characteristics than the German 75 mm and 88 mm weapons
column4: and penetrated enemy tank armour at a range of up to 2
column5: 500 m. In urban battles however
column6: the 122 mm cannon's barrel length often prevented the vehicle from manoeuvring in tight spots.

column1: From August 1944 to September 1945
column2: the ISU-122 with its A-19 cannon and the modernised ISU-122S with its D-25S cannon were produced in tandem
column3: as the 122 mm D-25S cannon supply was insufficient to furnish all the SPGs. By the 1st of June 1945
column4: 475 ISU-122S SPGs were built and used in battles in the final stage of the Great Patriotic War. In total
column5: 675 of them were made in their mass production period.

column1: ISU-122S SPGs were used across the entire functional scope of self-propelled artillery application. It was used as an assault weapon in breaking through fortified zones and in urban battles
column2: but with reduced effectiveness in comparison to the ISU-152. On the whole
column3: the SPG was highly regarded in this role as well. In the middle of the 1960s
column4: the SPGs were removed from service in the Soviet Army.";"La descripción estará lista pronto.";"САУ ИСУ-122С была создана в апреле 1944 года
column5: представляла собой модернизированный вариант самоходной установки ИСУ-122 и отличалась от нее установкой 122-мм пушки Д-25С образца 1944 года с клиновым полуавтоматическим затвором и дульным тормозом. Длина ствола составляла 48 калибров. Высота линии огня составляла 1795 мм. В состав экипажа машины входили пять человек
column6: его размещение было аналогичным размещению экипажа в установке ИСУ-122. Использование этой пушки несколько повысило боевую скорострельность с 2
column7: 2 до 3 выстрелов в минуту. А новые компактные противооткатные устройства и казенная часть пушки обеспечили лучшие условия работы боевого расчета. Применение пушки Д-25С вернуло утраченное на время превосходство над противником в артиллерийском вооружении. Она имела более высокие характеристики
column8: чем немецкие 75-мм и 88-мм орудия
column9: и обеспечивала пробитие брони танков противника на дальности до 2500 м. Но в городских боях длинный вылет ствола 122-мм пушки часто мешал маневрированию в узких местах.

column1: С августа 1944 до сентября 1945 годов был организован параллельный выпуск ИСУ-122 с пушкой А-19 и модернизированной ИСУ-122С с пушкой Д-25С
column2: так как производство САУ не было полностью обеспечено поставкой 122-мм пушек Д-25С. До 1 июня 1945 года было построено 475 самоходных установок ИСУ-122С
column3: которые использовались в боях в завершающем периоде Великой Отечественной войны. Всего за время серийного производства было изготовлено 675 экземпляров.

column1: ИСУ-122С использовалась во всех функциональных областях применения самоходной артиллерии. При прорыве укреплённых полос и в городских боях они применялись как штурмовые орудия
column2: но с меньшей эффективностью по сравнению с ИСУ-152. В целом
column3: самоходка заслужила хорошую оценку и в этой роли.

column1: Начиная с середины 1960-х годов
column2: установки были сняты с вооружения Советской армии.";"Działo samobieżne ISU-122S
column3: było stworzoną w kwietniu 1944 roku
column4: modernizacją działa samobieżnego ISU-122. Największa różnica polegała na zamontowaniu nowego działa - tym razem była to armata D-25S Mod. 1944 kal. 122 mm wyposażona w półautomatyczny zamek i hamulec wylotowy. Lufa miała długość 48 kalibrów. Pojazd obsługiwało 5 członków załogi w takim samym rozstawieniu
column5: jak w modelu ISU-122. Użycie nowego działa zwiększyło częstotliwość ostrzału z 2
column6: 2 do 3 pocisków na minutę.

column1: Zmiany w konstrukcji zamka działa
column2: znacznie ułatwiały jego obsługę przez załogę. Użycie nowego działa sprawiło
column3: iż wojska pancerne ZSRR były w stanie odzyskać przewagę w uzbrojeniu artyleryjskim. Nowe działo było porównywalne z niemieckimi działami kal. 75 mm i 88 mm i było w stanie przebijać pancerz wrogich czołgów nawet z odległości 2
column4: 5 kilometra. W bitwach miejskich
column5: długość armaty sprawiała
column6: iż manewrowanie nie należało do łatwych.

column1: Od sierpnia 1944 roku
column2: do września 1945 roku
column3: obydwa modele działa samobieżnego ISU-122 produkowano równocześnie - zapas dział D-25S był zbyt mały
column4: aby dało się je zamontować we wszystkich modelach. Do 1 czerwca 1945 roku
column5: zbudowano i wykorzystano w boju 475 egzemplarzy tego pojazdu. Ogółem udało się wyprodukować 675 maszyn tego typu.

column1: Dział samobieżnych ISU-122S używano zarówno w roli dział szturmowych przy przebijaniu się przez rejony umocnione jak i w walkach ulicznych - okazało się ono jednak słabsze od pojazdu ISU-152. Ogółem jednak radzieccy żołnierze ciepło wyrażali się o tych pojazdach.

W latach 60. column2: the SPGs were removed from service in the Soviet Army.";"ISU-122S \t作\t为\t ISU-122 \t自\t行\t火\t炮\t的\t一\t种\t改\t进\t型\t号\t，\t出\t现\t于\t 1944 \t年\t 4 \t月\t。\t它\t与\t后\t者\t的\t不\t同\t之\t处\t在\t于\t换\t用\t了\t采\t用\t楔\t式\t半\t自\t动\t炮\t闩\t、\t加\t装\t炮\t口\t制\t退\t器\t的\t 122 \t毫\t米\t D-25S 1944 \t年\t型\t火\t炮\t。\tD-25S \t在\t A-19 \t火\t炮\t的\t基\t础\t上\t进\t一\t步\t增\t加\t身\t管\t长\t度\t至\t 1795 \t毫\t米\t，\t达\t到\t了\t 48 \t倍\t口\t径\t。\t车\t组\t成\t员\t五\t人\t，\t位\t置\t与\t ISU-122 \t自\t行\t火\t炮\t相\t同\t。\t新\t式\t火\t炮\t采\t用\t楔\t式\t炮\t闩\t，\t战\t斗\t射\t速\t较\t采\t用\t横\t闩\t的\t A-19 \t火\t炮\t大\t幅\t提\t升\t，\t由\t平\t均\t每\t分\t钟\t 2.2 \t发\t增\t加\t到\t平\t均\t每\t分\t钟\t 3 \t发\t。\t另\t外\t，\t新\t火\t炮\t更\t为\t紧\t凑\t的\t驻\t退\t机\t和\t炮\t尾\t结\t构\t提\t高\t了\t人\t机\t工\t效\t，\t使\t得\t车\t组\t在\t狭\t小\t战\t斗\t室\t内\t的\t作\t战\t环\t境\t得\t以\t改\t善\t。\t此\t前\t红\t军\t的\t炮\t兵\t优\t势\t已\t经\t丧\t失\t了\t一\t段\t时\t间\t，\t但\t D-25S \t火\t炮\t的\t装\t备\t又\t将\t这\t个\t优\t势\t夺\t了\t回\t来\t。\t这\t种\t 122 \t毫\t米\t火\t炮\t的\t作\t战\t性\t能\t比\t德\t军\t的\t 75 \t毫\t米\t和\t 88 \t毫\t米\t火\t炮\t更\t加\t优\t秀\t，\t有\t能\t力\t在\t 2500 \t以\t上\t的\t距\t离\t击\t穿\t德\t军\t坦\t克\t的\t装\t甲\t。\t然\t而\t在\t巷\t战\t中\t，\t过\t长\t的\t炮\t管\t使\t其\t在\t紧\t急\t关\t头\t的\t转\t向\t变\t得\t十\t分\t困\t难\t。\t

column1: \t从\t 1944 \t年\t 4 \t月\t至\t 1945 \t年\t 9 \t月\t，\t装\t备\t 122 \t毫\t米\t A-19S \t火\t炮\t的\t ISU-122 \t和\t装\t备\t 122 \t毫\t米\t D-25S \t火\t炮\t的\t ISU-122S \t的\t生\t产\t总\t是\t交\t替\t进\t行\t，\t原\t因\t是\t D-25S \t的\t产\t量\t不\t足\t以\t满\t足\t全\t部\t需\t求\t。\t截\t止\t到\t 1945 \t年\t 1 \t月\t 1 \t日\t，\t共\t有\t 475 \t辆\t ISU-122S \t自\t行\t火\t炮\t被\t生\t产\t出\t来\t并\t参\t与\t了\t伟\t大\t卫\t国\t战\t争\t最\t后\t阶\t段\t的\t攻\t势\t。\t而\t ISU-122 \t在\t整\t个\t量\t产\t期\t内\t的\t总\t产\t量\t最\t终\t定\t格\t在\t 675 \t辆\t。\t

ISU-122S \t的\t使\t用\t几\t乎\t涵\t盖\t了\t自\t行\t火\t炮\t在\t战\t场\t上\t的\t所\t有\t职\t能\t范\t围\t，\t作\t为\t一\t种\t突\t击\t武\t器\t它\t被\t用\t于\t突\t破\t敌\t方\t的\t防\t御\t工\t事\t地\t带\t以\t及\t城\t市\t巷\t战\t中\t，\t但\t不\t如\t ISU-152 \t重\t型\t突\t击\t炮\t的\t效\t果\t突\t出\t。\t不\t过\t总\t体\t而\t言\t，\tISU-122S \t作\t为\t一\t种\t突\t击\t火\t力\t角\t色\t的\t表\t现\t还\t是\t很\t出\t色\t的\t。\t

\t到\t了\t 20 \t世\t纪\t 60 \t年\t代\t中\t期\t，\tISU-122S \t在\t苏\t联\t军\t队\t中\t全\t部\t退\t出\t现\t役\t。";"ISU-122 自走砲（SPG）の\t現代型として、\tISU-122S\t自走砲が\t1944年\t4月に\t製造されました。\t鋳造製の\t半自動式尾栓と\t砲口制退器が\t備わっている\t122 mm D-25S Mod.1944\tを\t搭載している\t点で、\tISU-122Sは\tISU-122\tとは\t異なっていました。\t砲身の\t長さは\t48口径で、\t砲列線の\t高さは\t1
column2: 795mmに\t及びました。\tこの\t戦車には\t5名乗り\t組むことが\t可能で、\t乗組員室は\tISU-122\tと\t同じものでした。\t戦闘中における\t発射速度は\t向上し、\t1分間に\t2.2発から\t3発発射可能でした。\t砲に\t備えられた\t新しい\tコンパクトな\t跳弾の\t仕組みと\t砲尾により、\t戦闘員にとってより\t良い\t作業環境となりました。\t砲撃の\t優位性が\t敵に\t対して\t時々劣っている\t時もありましたが、\tD-25S\t砲により、\tこの\t懸念は\t少なくなりました。\tこの\t砲は、\tドイツの\t75 mm 砲や\t88 mmよりも\t優れた\t戦闘特性を\t備えており、\t最大で\t2
column3: 500ｍの\t範囲で\t敵車両の\t装甲を\t貫通させることができました。\tしかし、\t現代的な\t戦いにおいては、\t122 mm\t砲の\t砲身は、\t狭い\t場所では\t車両の\t機動性を\t妨害するものとなっていました。\t

column1: 1944年の\t8月から\t1945年の\t9月にかけて、\tすべての\tISU-122Sに\t搭載するのに、\t122 mm D-25S\t砲の\t数が\t不足していたため、\tA-19砲を\t備えた\tISU-122\tと\tD-25S\t砲を\t備えた\t現代化改修された\tISU-122Sは\t相前後して\t製造されました。\t1945年\t6月\t1日までに\t475両の\tISU-122Sが\t製造され、\t大祖国戦争の\t最終段階における\t戦闘で\t使用されました。\t大量生産が\t行われていた\t期間中に、\t合計で\t675両の\tISU-122Sが\t製造されました。\t
ISU-122 SPGは、\t自走砲兵の\t全体的な\t機能的役割として\t使用されました。\t要塞化された\t区域や\t都市での\t戦いにおいては、\tこの\t自走砲は\t攻撃武器として\t使用されましたが、\tISU-152\tと\t比べると、\tその\t性能は\t劣っていました。\t全体的に、\tこの\t自走砲はこの\t役割においても\t高く\t評価されていました。\t

column3: його розміщення було аналогічним розміщенню екіпажу в установці ІСУ-122. Використання цієї гармати дещо підвищило бойову скорострільність з 2
column4: 2 до 3 пострілів на хвилину. А нові компактні пристрої противідкотів і казенна частина гармати забезпечили кращі умови роботи бойового розрахунку. Застосування гармати Д-25С повернуло тимчасово втрачену перевагу над противником в артилерійському озброєнні. Вона мала вищі характеристики
column5: ніж німецькі 75-мм і 88-мм гармати
column6: і забезпечувала пробиття броні танків противника на дальності до 2500 м. Але в міських боях довгий виліт ствола 122-мм гармати нерідко заважав маневруванню у вузьких місцях.

column1: З серпня 1944 до вересня 1945 років був організований паралельний випуск ІСУ-122 з гарматою А-19 і модернізовану ІСУ-122С з гарматою Д-25С
column2: оскільки виробництво САУ не було повністю забезпечене постачанням 122-мм гармат Д-25С. До 1 червня 1945 року було побудовано 475 самохідних установок ІСУ-122С
column3: які використовувалися в боях в завершальному періоді Великої Вітчизняної війни. Всього за час серійного виробництва було виготовлено 675 екземплярів.

column1: ІСУ-122С використовувалася у всіх функціональних областях застосування самохідної артилерії. Під час прориву укріплених смуг і в міських боях вони застосовувалися як штурмові гармати
column2: але з меншою ефективністю в порівнянні з ІСУ-152. В цілому

column1: A Szovjet Hadseregben az 1960-as években vonták ki a szolgálatból.";"설명이 준비중입니다.";"Апісанне не гатова";"The ISU-122S self-propelled gun was created in April 1944 as a modernised variation of the ISU-122 SPG. It differed from the latter in that it was equipped with a 122 mm D-25S Mod. 1944 cannon with a wedge-type semi-automatic breech block and a muzzle brake. The barrel's length came to 48 calibres. The height of its firing line came to 1
column2: 795 mm. The vehicle had a five-man crew and its crew housing was the same as in the ISU-122. The use of this cannon increased its rate of fire in combat from 2.2 to 3 shots per minute. The cannon's new compact recoil mechanisms and breech housing provided better working conditions for the combat crew. Artillery superiority over the enemy had been absent for some time
column3: but the use of the D-25S cannon brought it back. It had higher combat characteristics than the German 75 mm and 88 mm weapons
column4: and penetrated enemy tank armour at a range of up to 2
column5: 500 m. In urban battles however
column6: the 122 mm cannon's barrel length often prevented the vehicle from manoeuvring in tight spots.

column1: From August 1944 to September 1945
column2: the ISU-122 with its A-19 cannon and the modernised ISU-122S with its D-25S cannon were produced in tandem
column3: as the 122 mm D-25S cannon supply was insufficient to furnish all the SPGs. By the 1st of June 1945
column4: 475 ISU-122S SPGs were built and used in battles in the final stage of the Great Patriotic War. In total
column5: 675 of them were made in their mass production period.

column1: ISU-122S SPGs were used across the entire functional scope of self-propelled artillery application. It was used as an assault weapon in breaking through fortified zones and in urban battles
column2: but with reduced effectiveness in comparison to the ISU-152. On the whole
column3: the SPG was highly regarded in this role as well.

column2: the SPGs were removed from service in the Soviet Army.";"簡介尚未準備好。";"简\t介\t尚\t未\t准\t备\t好\t。";;

column1: encyclopedia/ussr_isu_122/desc;"The ISU-122 SPG was created in 1943 based on the IS-1 with the 122 mm A-19 Mod. 1937 field cannon's tipping unit installed in its cabin. The cannon was mounted with an offset to the right from the hull's central axis. The driver's compartment was placed to the left of it. The weapon had a relatively low rate of fire
column2: amounting to around 2.2 shots per minute. The barrel's length came to 46.3 calibres. Its armour-piercing round weighed 25 kg and had an 800 m/s muzzle velocity. Its ammunition load consisted of separately loaded shots. Its direct firing range came to 5
column4: and its maximum range was 14
column5: 300 m. The fighting compartment was also equipped with two 7.62 mm PPSh and PPS submachine guns with 1
column6: 491 rounds and 25 F-1 hand grenades. Starting from October 1944
column7: a 12.7 mm DShK anti-aircraft machine gun was mounted on a bracket next to the commander's hatch. The machine gun had a 250 round ammunition complement. The crew consisted of four to five men. The crew housing in this vehicle was the same as in the ISU-152. Its armour protection was also the same as on the ISU-152. The cannon's gun mantlet had 100 mm thick armour.

column1: The vehicle was mass-produced from April 1944 to September 1945 at the ChKZ factory in Chelyabinsk. In total
column3: 735 of them were made.

column1: The new SPGs were widely used in battles as tank destroyers and assault weapons in the final stage of the Great Patriotic War.
The long barrel length of the A-19 cannon installed in the fore of the armoured cabin limited the vehicle's manoeuvrability.
A small number of ISU-122s were modernised in 1958. Only their sights and radio sets underwent modernisation. At the beginning of the 1960s
column2: the SPGs were removed from service in the Soviet Army.";"Description à venir.";"Il semovente ISU-122 venne creato nel 1943 basandosi sullo scafo dell'IS-1 con il cannone da campo A-19 mod. 1937 da 122mm installato sulla casamatta nel lato destro rispetto all'asse centrale e la postazione del pilota posta a sinistra di quest ultimo. Il cannone aveva un rateo di fuoco relativamente basso pari a circa 2
column3: 2 colpi al minuto. La lunghezza della canna era di 46
column4: 3 calibri e le sue munizioni perforanti pesavano 25kg con una velocità alla volata di 800m/s. Il raggio di tiro diretto era di 5000m mentre la gittata massima di 14.300m. Il vano di combattimento era equipaggiato con due mitragliatrici PPSh e PPS da 1491 colpi oltre a 25 granate F-1. A partire dall'ottobre del 1944
column5: venne installata una mitragliatrice antiaerea DShK da 12
column6: 7mm posta su un supporto vicino al portello del comandante con 250 munizioni. L'equipaggio era costituito da quattro o cinque uomini nella stessa disposizione dell' ISU-152 così come la corazzatura. Il mantello del cannone aveva uno spessore di 100mm.

column1: Il veicolo venne prodotto in massa dall'aprile del 1944 al settembre del 1945 alla fabbrica ChKZ in Chelyabinsk. In totale vennero costruite 1735 unità.
Il nuovo semovente venne largamente utilizzato in battaglia come cacciacarri e semovente d'assalto nella fase finale della Grande Guerra Patriottica.
La lunga canna del cannone A-19 limitava la manovrabilità del mezzo.
Un piccolo numero di ISU-122 venne modernizzato nel 1958 e le modifiche prevedevano solo un nuovo mirino ed una nuova radio. All'inizio del 1960
column2: vennero rimossi dal servizio nell'esercito Sovietico.";"Hinweis: Dieser Eintrag wird in Kürze auch auf Deutsch verfügbar sein.
